Job Description: Purpose of the job: The role is responsible for managing our front desk on a daily basis and for performing a variety of administrative and clerical tasks.Main Responsibilities: • Stand, Greet, and welcome guests as soon as they arrive at the office #This applies to all persons entering the building whether they be VIP’s or Cleaners. All are to be treated with the same courtesy.• Ensure all Company COVID-19 procedures are followed ie: Temperature Testing, Hand Sanitizing. (If visitor or guest log temperature in the appropriate logbook)• Direct visitors to the appropriate person and office• Answer, screen, and forward incoming phone calls• Ensure the reception & lobby area is tidy and presentable, with all necessary stationery and material (Building accessories)• Provide basic and accurate information in-person and via phone/email• Receive, sort, and distribute daily mail/deliveries• Maintain office security by following safety procedures and controlling access via the reception desk (monitor logbook, issue visitor badges)• Providing a good environment and engaging with visitors, guests, suppliers, contractors & employees effectively.• Lunch Breaks are to be staggered to make sure there is somebody manning reception at all times. Lunch breaks should be taken in the kitchen area adjacent to the elevators not in the lobby area.
Job Requirement: • 2 years’ experience regarding receptionist background• Good at Microsoft Office, English and be able to communicate with foreigner• Professional attitude and appearance• Good customer service attitude, friendly and hardworking, organized and courtesy.

Job Description: JOB SUMMARY:  • Overlook office administrative function at the region office to ensure effectiveness, efficiency, and safety in the workplace. • Responsible for developing intra-office communication protocols, streamlining administrative procedures, inventory control, office staff (Security & Cleaner) supervision and task delegation.• Planning and monitoring Office budgets, Office Assets Tracking, and Maintenance.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: Facility Management:• Coordinating meeting needs and managing the Meeting Room's schedules, calendars, and appointments.• Compiling with correspondence, Comments, Complaints and Queries through Speak-Up Channel and reporting to Management Team directly. • Ensure security, integrity, and confidentiality of data.• Oversee adherence to office policies and procedures.• Organizing induction programs for new employees at regions.• Control stationery and housekeeping material & First Aid Medicine• Ensure Region Premises are clean & Tidy, office and furniture maintenance and fixing• Office support, Event & God praying (Including Khmer and Chines New Year….)• Ensure road, parking place, and garden look nice• Follow up and inspect all areas and activities with the schedule• Ensure security, cleaner, housekeeper, and gardener perform work following schedule and checklist• Work closely with outsourced janitor or supervisor for work quality improving•	Monitor work of security in terms of staff and guest physical checking when in/out • Ensure security is properly patrolled on-premise• Ensure all staff and guest vehicles are stuck with tickets and properly park• Ensure all guests are registered before access to a receptionist at the region office• Check and collect security daily report and correct it if need• Keep connecting with security & local authorities when an incident happens at the region office.• Ensure Fung Shui water is working well and report to the group• Preparing staff uniforms with the correct size and distribution• Follow up on the bill of water and power supply, arrange the payment and recording• Other expense-related and recordingAttendant Management:• Monitor staff, cleaners, gardeners, and security attendance, and leave requests.• Ensure security, cleaner, housekeeper, and gardener come to work on time• Ensure proper arrangement when cleaner or housekeeper take leave• Ensure security are present at the workplace or change shift with proper handoverOther:• Support company events when required • Support manager when required
Job Requirement: Education: Fresh Graduated Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Management, or other related fields recommended.Experiences: At least 3 years of working experience in HR & Administration rolesSkills:- Time Management Skills- Good understanding of office management processes- Critical thinking skill and problem-solving skills- Good at English and Microsoft Office (Words, Excel, and PowerPoint)

Job Description: • Manage all the consultants and specialists during design stage.• Advise on VE and cost saving during design stage and tendering stage.• Provide solutions to construction issues on site.• Manage and issue shop drawings, method statements, material selection.• Conduct QA/QC to ensure the quality of construction to meet the specifications and requirements.• Manage the design changes to ensure the construction is built following the most updated drawings.• Perform site visits to active construction site and participate in weekly and monthly site meetings.• Work closely with Construction Manager regarding project quality and progress.• Coordinate with Sales and Marketing teams to provide necessary construction documents for sales and marketing purposes.• Coordinate with Legal team to provide necessary construction documents for permit applications.• Coordinate with QS team to achieve necessary cost saving during the construction stage.• Perform other tasks assigned by Project Manager or Project Director.

Job Description: 	Coordination receiving & checking related documents from other departments such as approval documents, purchase request and invoice, Hand Over, Delivery Note…. making sure it’s correct related to fixed assets following company closing schedule and procedure.	Checking and verifying on Fixed assets recording, assets code creation, tagging, photo report submission to ensure details report for new acquisition 	Checking and verifying on assets on progress (CWIP) capitalization on handover report, invoices, and recording following company procedure 	Monthly monitoring on fixed assets movement and follow up with other depts, stores to ensure that the movement is encounter and transfer, disposal or write-off form is properly prepared and records	Preparing all monthly reports such as Investment Report, Fixed Asset Listing reconcile with TB, Capex Planning report, CWIP report, Fixed Asset Transfer Report, Write Off and Disposal, PPE 5% Retention Report	Carrying on fixed assets physical count planning conduct following the Company procedure	Preparing the Purchase Journal of Fixed Asset for Monthly Tax Declaration	Checking and Verifying on JV 	Make sure all Asset is completely tagging	Make sure all Asset is completely update in detail listing for all branch	To review monthly retention report	Update and Check Asset need to be transfer from CWIP Report	Follow up Fixed asset confirmation to related team	Periodic physical counts of fixed assets.	Leading Fixed Asset Team and ensure all fixed assets entry, all report and depreciation run is completed.	Preparing and developing standard operation procedure (SOP), and policy	Set up Management by Objective (MBO/Staff Performance Appraisal) to team 	Liaise with internal and external auditors on all aspects of reporting
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor or master’s degree in accounting or relevant fields•	At least 3-5 years of experience in a comparable position in another industry•	Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written•	Knowledge of Accounting standard and Cambodia Taxation is desirable•	Good spreadsheet, SAP, and ERP accounting software•	Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

	Train standard course, for test (pre & post-test), and for license renewal test to employees 
	Coordinate with various parties to arrange trainings according to the plan
	Prepare lesson plans and training materials before conducting training
	Ensure that all training materials are kept properly and completely
	Develop training courses and materials such as manual, training documents/handouts, sales pitch with the Bancassurance Training Sales  and Training Strategy Team (if any)
	Find other resources for updating SVL training materials and training methodology
	Join and undertake the monitoring and follow up the action plan and budget expenses
	Monitor guidelines and orders regarding sales training to develop training courses and presentations
	Coordinate with internal and external parties to support trainings such as training location booking and preparing documents
	Assist HTD to conduct training needs assessment, data collection, data analysis, and reports in order to improve staff capacity development
	Assist HTD to prepare annual work plan and budget plan, and other relevant project implementation documents
	Record and keep track of training history and evaluations for KPI and training development
	Record training information in the database
	Perform other tasks assigned by Supervisors.

Others
	Work closely with Head of Training, Head of Sales & Marketing, Sales Manager and other relevant teams.
	Carry out other duties appropriately to this post as requested by line manager
	Be an invigilator and do the correction of exam paper when needed.
Job Requirement:
Position Requirement 
	Bachelor Degree or higher, graduates with Education, Finance, Business, Economics, or Marketing will be an advantage 
	At least 2 years of experience in Training or Bancassurance 
	Computer literacy
	Good command in English
	Good in Training skill
	Critical communication 
	Good coordination
	Good interpersonal skills, and service mind
	Independent and willing to travel on mission

job title: Assistant Manager, Internal Audit & Risk Management
position: Assistant Manager, Internal Audit & Risk Management
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

•	Plan and design the scope of internal audit working process and procedure in conjunction with the business process, objective and implementation
•	Monitor internal audit testing and projects are conducted on timely basis and follow the working plan and process of specified area and identify reportable issues
•	Review and update the suitability of internal control design
•	Report audit findings and prepare audit report for line manager to review
•	Prepare the update of internal audit policy upon significant change of company operation
•	Support line manager on oversea and monitor risk assessment of assigned department or functional area in established/required timeline
•	Support line manager for establishing Business Continuance Plan (BCP),
•	Develop and update risk management policies and procedures.
•	Work closely with all Head of Departments and other relevant management team.
•	Carry out other duties appropriate to this post as requested by line manager.
Job Requirement:
Position Requirement 

•	Bachelor Degrees or Master degree (is a plus) in finance/audit/risk or related field.
•	At least 3 years experiences combination in internal audit/risk assessment and/or management required
•	Good communication and interpersonal skills, strong knowledge of Cambodia’s internal statutory requirements.
•	Good knowledge in Business and Risk Regulatory
•	Good mix of corporate, commercial and litigation experience
•	Computer literacy
•	Good command in English

Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
1. Preparing the laboratory for lab sessions.
●	Liaise with teaching staff on their needs for Science experiments.
●	Provide assistance to teachers in regards to student’s safety during experiments.
●	Prepare the laboratory in advance before the lesson starts, set up any laboratory
●	equipment needed for the experiment, such as microscopes, test tubes etc.
●	Prepare simple reagents regularly used during lab procedures if requested.

2. Cleaning the Lab
●	Cleaning up any spills, washing the equipment and glassware, such as conical flasks,
pipettes and beakers used by students.
●	Put back all the chemicals and equipment in the designated place after the lesson ends.
●	Dispose unnecessary materials, broken apparatus or any damaged equipment in accordance with regulations, including toxic substances.

3. Promoting safety
●	Ensure that first aid kit boxes contain necessary materials.
●	Ensure that all safety materials are in place and functioning such as emergency shower, fire blanket, fume hood, lab coats, goggles etc.
●	Ensure that students adhere to the lab dress code and wear protective gear, such as safety goggles, during experiments.
●	Ensures that students do not practice any unsafe behaviors in the lab.
●	Lock up all the reagents and unplug all electrical equipment to minimize the chances of accidents and fires.
●	Show the students how to handle chemical spills, dispose of broken glassware and get rid of non-hazardous and chemical waste safely.
●	Ensure that toxic materials and non-toxic are stored in their proper cabinets.
Job Requirement:
●	Cambodian national
●	Educational background in Science or relevant field.  
●	High level of English proficiency  
●	Experience working in a lab is preferred. 
●	Experience working in an international school setting is a plus
●	Compassionate, organized, flexible and a team player
●	Excellent record of professional and personal integrity

job title: Finance Supervisor / Finance Executive Based in Poipet
position: Finance Supervisor / Finance Executive Based in Poipet
Job Description:
•	Investigate and report discrepancies determined through audit process.
•	Audit all paperwork from each department
•	Prepare reports based on the audit conclusions.
•	Maintain accurate records and files pertaining to daily audits of areas of responsibility
•	Prepare routing and special reports as assigned.
•	Apply accounting principles to the financial operation of the agency and assist the Manager to estimate future revenues and expenditures for the preparation of budgets.
•	Analyze current and historical account records, expense and revenue trends, variance analysis, estimated and realized revenues, administrative commitments and obligations incurred.
•	Advise management on financial matters such as effective use of resources.
•	Process credit applications and write off uncollectible accounts.
•	Responsible for accounts receivable and accounts payable reconciliation and review.
•	Interpret accounts, records, and financial data for management.
•	Maintain an effective fund accounting system.
•	Compile figures to assist staff in preparing agency grant requests and contracts.
•	Supervise personnel performing routine phases of bookkeeping operations as delegated to do so.
•	Prepare reports which summarize and forecast the agency’s business activity and financial position in areas of income, expenses and earnings based on past, present and expected operations.
•	Always does the best to uphold the name and reputation of Company.
•	All other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•	A Bachelor’s degree, preferably in business or accounting, or other related field, with a Master’s degree or CPA desirable.
•	Minimum 3 years finance experience in a large organization.
•	Five year experience in an accounting position with specific experience in fund accounting, general ledger and financial reporting and analysis preferred.
•	Experience in accounting systems management
•	Experience in staff supervision and team leadership
•	Excellent computer skills with spread sheet and word processing ability.
•	The ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with supervisor subordinates, co-workers and associates.
•	Excellent written and oral communications skills
•	30 years old and above.
•	Self-starter, proven ability to manage multiple accounts and finances with changing priorities.
•	Good organizational skills and the ability to implement financial controls.
•	Outstanding of accounting software using such as MS Excel, MS Quick Books...etc. 
•	Strong communication, interpersonal skills and team building
•	Enthusiastic, energetic and resilient with strong people management skills.
•	Must be flexible and open to changes in procedures.

Job Description:
** Key Responsibilities:
The post holder will be responsible for developing and maintaining the database management system under the
COMMIT Project, Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) unit. S/he is also expected to work closely with the TB-MIS team.

** Main Responsibilities
- Upgrade and manage the database system, data collection tools, data management manual/procedure, and relevant program templates
- Ensure system maintenance and backup
- Revise users’ guide for effective data management and reporting system
- Conduct training to relevant staffs and sub-partners on data entry and be able to use the monitoring system
- Routinely check recorded data and ensure its consistency and completeness
- Provide coaching, and facilitation to ensure data quality, the deadline of any task and any follow-up plan
- Identify and address the gaps and challenges in achieving the set indicators, and report to the line manager for actions required
- Validate the consistency of data between program monitoring data and TB-MIS
- Provide support to field operation on the data verification in TB-MIS
- With technical guidance from the TB-MIS team in assisting system customizations
- Assist line manager to review the program data for rapid monitoring and response
- Engage in KHANA’s institutional capacity development,
- knowledge management and sharing of technical expertise amongst the team members and the organization
- Support KHANA/COMMIT’s management team if needed

** Personal Skills
- Knowledgeable in software programming (Java), database management MySQL, Hibernat.
- Knowledgeable in web-based solutions HTML, JavaScript, JQuery.
- Knowledgeable in application development frameworks JBoss, Seam, Maven.
- Ability to perform data analytics e.g., using the pivot table in MS Excel or other statistical software packages
SPSS or Stata.
- Ability to plan and organize a substantial workload comprised of complex, diverse tasks and responsibilities.
- Strong communication and presentation skills in Khmer/English.
- Demonstrate good interpersonal skills
- Demonstrable and observable personal integrity ability to cope with pressure and to work flexibly to ensure that
the project’s objectives are met.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree of Computer Science and Engineering or related fields
- Demonstrated ability to work effectively with team members
- Experiences of cloud-based server management and domain -management.
- Experience with health information system is preferred
- Previous experience working on USAID or other donor-funded projects is preferred.

** Interested candidates must send your resume to our email address at recruitment@khana.org.kh before or not later than 30 th November 2022 – 5.00 pm. Only short-listed candidates will be notified for further process.

Note: Detailed Job Description for the position will be sent to those who request and mention in the email. Please kindly mention your expected salary. KHANA is committed to equal opportunities and welcomes applications from appropriate qualified people from all sections of the community. 

Qualified TB Survivor, people experiencing with TB, people living with HIV, Transgender Person, MSM, Female Entertainment Workers, People with Disability and other women are particularly encouraged to apply.

job title: Field Officer at Kom Pong Cham – Koh Soutin
position: Field Officer at Kom Pong Cham – Koh Soutin
Job Description:
** Key Responsibilities:
The post holder will be responsible for leading and managing COMMIT project at the field level (OD-based). S/he will
provide programmatic guidance and technical support to lay counselors (LC), who directly work with health centers
assigned community. The Field Officer will provide professional and technical inputs to lay counselors in developing annual and quarterly targets to be achieved, identifying TA needs, and providing management support to timely implementation of planned activities. S/he will be responsible for OD-based programmatic and financial performance management. S/he also will support the OD and health center to work on TB-MIS data entry.

** Main Responsibilities
- Be representative of KHANA staff for TB projects in the community
- Ensure successful implementation of active case findings and linkage to care and treatment
- Work in a team with lay counsellors to develop the monthly, quarterly and annual work plan and target to meet the project objectives
- Provide technical directions and support to the lay counsellors to establish peer support group (PSG) as required
- Assist technical officer and other collaborating partners in developing training strategies and materials and
facilitate training.
- Organize, lead and facilitate project-related meetings, including the creation of agendas and preparation of
materials
-  Monitor implementation of planned activities through monthly progress review meetings, reports review, and field
trips
- Monitor project deliverables and timelines, solve when issues arise, and take corrective actions as needed
- Prepare monthly, quarterly and semi-annual reports, and track budgets and expenditures regularly

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

Job Description:

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile: Orkidé Villa Group is a real estate development company based in Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. The company specializes in the development of high-quality, mixed-use developments,based on principally residential uses. Bringing together a Board of Directors with a wide variety of skills and experience, Orkidé Villa Group develops market leading and prestigious schemes. Building on the success of our first project, Orkidé Villa ‘The Grand’, we have commenced construction of ‘The Royal’ and ‘The Botanic City’ schemes that we aim to deliver a new benchmark of quality for the Cambodia market.We are committed to offering the highest level of service to our customers and to producing developments that are widely recognized for their caliber.

Job Description: 1. Monitor costs and expenses to assist in budget preparation2. Coordinate office activities and operations to secure efficiency of office work flow and compliance to company policies3. Supervise administrative staff and divide responsibilities to ensure performance4. Ensure all the time the office is clean and clear with Green/healthy environment and high level of working safety and staff welfare.5. Completing and overseeing the maintenance and repair works of all systems for plumbing, electrical, ventilation, air conditioning, security, lighting and fire safety in the head office and project offices.6. Manage SIM Card, phone calls and correspondence (e-mail, letters, packages etc.)7. Handle and control all office facilities and security/Safety equipment and spare parts stock: electrical tools, appliances and materials (i.e. power drill, electric screwdrivers, wire, light bulbs, plugs…etc.), air conditioner spare parts, fire extinguishers…8. Register and update all office equipment and assets inventory database including furniture, desk computers, laptops, printers, air conditioners, refrigerators, coffee machines and other equipment considered as fixed assets. '  9. Control E-Security System for the head office.10. Supervise all repair works and renovations of the building in the head office.11. Properly arrange new workstations for new comers according to the request of concerned department staff.12. Initiates requests for the maintenance and repairs of office equipment and facility maintenance and repairs; coordinates movement of office furniture and equipment within department13. Assist the teams (maintenance, cleaner and security guards) in processing any paper works.  14. Monitors the processing of invoices for payment to vendors and the maintenance of account and expenditure records 15. Track stocks of office supplies and place orders when necessary16. Establishes work standards and oversees staff training on work and program operations and conducts performance evaluations and initiates disciplinary actions as required  17. Perform other tasks assigned by Line Manager/HRD
Job Requirement: Education/Experience	- Bachelor degree in HR & Administration or related field- 5 years of work experience in HR & Administration, Facility or  Operations and logistics Management- Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment- Experience with Setting Objectives/KPI for the team and evaluation.- Ability to communicate in English- Excellent communication and leadership skill- Ability to use Ms. Office, outlook, internet and other related  applications.Knowledge / Skills / Abilities	- Be flexible and available to interact with employees at all levels- Be detailed, precise, serious and careful- Good negotiation skill and well organized- Knowledge of electrical wiring (or being an electrician),  plumbing and air conditioner is a plus- Good team management skill- Initiative, commitment, honesty, flexibility, independent and  adaptability

Job Description:
• Assist the line supervisor to develop event activities planning proposals.
• Assist in setup sales product displays to build brand awareness to targeted customers.
• Manage events and address potential problems that may arise.
• Follow up on yearly plans and find solutions to push all proposed tasks/activities to happen as per the timeline approved. 
• Monitor seasonal decoration artwork for sales showroom & festival events.
• Implement new strategies to improve the quality of designs and graphic visuals.
• Control & follow up and check all photos of each event's activities.
• Liaise with vendors, exhibitors, and stakeholders during the event planning process to ensure everything is in order.
• Manage overall event set-up, dismantlement, and follow-up processes.
• Coordinate with supplies to handle queries and resolve any issues before & during the event schedule to ensure operations run smoothly in compliance with best practices.
• Monitor the competition and industry trends, specifically online or digital marketing efforts.
• Record customer feedback to internal terms to help mold overall strategy and exploit opportunities.
• Work with the manager & team to provide training and accreditation of events.
• Other tasks assigned by the line supervisor/manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing or Business Administration,
Experience
• At least 2-3 years of work experience in a similar role & marketing field.
• Ability to communicate in English. 
• Good Ability in Microsoft office & good presentation skills.
• Motivated, pro-active, and team-work oriented
• Be detailed, precise, serious and careful 
• Initiative new idea concepts, flexibility, independence and adaptability.
• Negotiation skills, and creativity. 
• Event proposal and development and execution as plan
• Involve suppliers for quotations at each stage of the campaign. 
• Attention to detail and ability to work effectively under pressure
• Be able to work overtime sometimes, evening or weekend (events) and tight deadlines.
• Be creative, honest, hard-working, good attitude and able to work under pressure.

Job Description:
Maintenance 
- Responsible to lead the equipment reliability inclusive maintenance activities at dedicated area as per Maintenance COM
- Responsible for maintenance KPI example OEE, B&D, WO creation & completion, % PM, and total maintenance cost/HL within agreed target
- Responsible for work order (WO) scoping, prioritization, quality of work order detail, distribute of work orders, and the effective follow up and closing out of work orders
- To assign work and manpower scheduling with line responsible through work order system
- To review technician skills matrix and roles from time to time
- Responsible for COM audit with maintenance manager 
- To lead line responsible and communication with production line leader for any production plan and OEE improvement 
- Implement and review WI, SMP & OPL
- To attend daily packaging PMS meeting at related area and escalate breakdown issue during maintenance PMS board
- Weekly meeting with production line leader for maintenance service windows and TBM activities
- Provide and conduct weekly performance evaluation and plan for improvement by RCA or advanced problem solving 
- To carry the overhaul planning, manpower scheduling, spare part list, and review as per COM 
- Troubleshoot and attend for any breakdown even off office hour
- Well maintain all maintenance documents and records system
- To contact OEM for any downtime and spare part detail 
- workshop management

Quality 
- Practice GMP, understand HACCP process and food safety risk
- Apply toolbox hygiene standard and workshop area cleanliness
- To monitor/improve rejection from line within agreed rate which reduce wastage
- Support QC for quality activities

CE 
- Leading and participating in various maintenance improvement project based on Lead TPM
- Ensures ideas of continues improvement are captures
- Update any new ideas into work instructions, OPL and SMP
- Key drive implementation of Lead TPM activities example 5S, Gemba Kaizen, PMS and problem solving at maintenance area
- Support production and maintenance for AM, PM and SMED
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor/ Engineering degree in mechanical, process engineering, electrical engineering, or relevant areas.
2. Knowledge of maintenance standards and maintenance system
3. English (spoken and written) – an advantage.
4. Willing to learn and drive for results
5. Good interpersonal skill, able to communicate, work together to all level and empowering people
6. Innovative in problem solving
7. Basic technological skill: Microsoft Office software like Excel, Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and more
8. Able to work under pressure
Company Profile: Cambrew Ltd.  the largest and most modern brewery in the country, produces a variety of national and international beer, stout, soft drink and water. Its brewery is situated in the main port city of Cambodia known as Sihanoukville, about 230km west of the capital Phnom Penh.Cambrew (Angkor Beer) portfolio of Beers, Stouts, Soft Drinks and bottled water in Cambodia. Our brands include the Kingdom’s most loved beer – Angkor Premium Beer, Angkor Premium Extra Stout, Klang, Black Panther, Turbog, Carlsberg, Guinness, Pepsi, Angkor Puro and many more. Keen to embark on a career with a portfolio of renowned local and international brands?Join us and be part of a dynamic and exciting team today!

job title: គិលានុបដ្ឋាយិកា (Nurse)
position: គិលានុបដ្ឋាយិកា (Nurse)
Job Description:
•​ ផ្តល់ការថែទាំនិងប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ដល់បុគ្គលិកទូទៅដែលមកទទួលការពិគ្រោះយោបល់ និងព្យាបាលនៅក្លីនិចក្រុមហ៊ុន ។ 
• ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចាត់ចែងក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ឱសថហើយត្រូវធ្វើការ បញ្ជាទិញក្នុងករណី ឱសថអស់ស្តុក ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ 
• ផ្តល់ការលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់កម្មករ និយោជិតដែលមានជំងឺ 
• ការងារដទៃផ្សេងទៀត នឹងត្រូវផ្តល់ជូនដោយប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ ។
Job Requirement:
• អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាខ្មែរ និង អង់គ្លេស បានល្អ  
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 25 ឆ្នាំ ឡើង
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ 
• អាចជឿទុកចិត្តបាន 
• គោរពេលវេលាធ្វើការ និង ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម

job title: មន្ត្រីជំនូយការព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ចំនួន០១រូប
position: មន្ត្រីជំនូយការព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ចំនួន០១រូប
Job Description:
មន្ត្រីព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា មានលក្ខណសម្បត្តិ និងបទពិសោធន៍ដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញ រចនា និងកាត់តវីដេអូ ឬ Graphic design
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច០៣ឆ្នាំ លើការងាររៀបចំវីដេអូ កាត់តរូបភាព និងរចនា
- មានចំណេះដឹងជាមូលដ្ឋាន និងបទពិសោធនៃការគ្រប់គ្រងម៉ាស៊ីនមេ កុំព្យូទ័រ និង Hardware ផ្សេងៗ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍លើការប្រើប្រាស់ MS 365 រួមទាំង SharePoint, OneDrive, Power Automate
- មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator និង Adobe Premiere ជាដើម
- មានការយល់ដឹងអំពីបច្ចេកវិទ្យា ចំណេះដឹងថ្មីៗ ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ចុងក្រោយបង្អស់ ប្រព័ន្ធទាក់ទងនឹងបច្ចេកវិទ្យា។
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន ប៉ុន្តែផ្តល់ជូនអទិភាពជូនដល់មន្រ្តីរាជការដែលស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាដ្ឋាន។

បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃចន្ទ ១២កើត ខែមិគសិរ ឆ្នាំខាល ទោស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៥ ខែធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាម

សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE

អាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “ក” ជាន់ទី៣
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : ០៧៧ ៣៥៩ ៩៤៩/អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនាញតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចំណូលសារពើពន្ធ   ចំនួន០២រូប
position: មន្រ្តីជំនាញតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចំណូលសារពើពន្ធ   ចំនួន០២រូប
Job Description:
គុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬខ្ពស់ជាងនេះ ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច, ការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម, គោលនយោបាយសាធារណៈ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោច ០២ ឆ្នាំ ទាក់ទងនឹងការស្រាវជ្រាវ និងវាយតម្លៃ,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងឧបករណ៍វាស់វែង (Tools), វិធីសាស្រ្ត (Methodologies), និងគោលការណ៍ (Principles) នៃការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ (M&E),
- បង្ហាញសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រមូល និងវិភាគទិន្នន័យ,
- មានជំនាញវិភាគគោលនយោបាយ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានទាន់ពេលវេលា,
- មានលទ្ធភាពធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធការងារ,
- ចេះធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងជំរុញក្រុមទាំងមូលឱ្យសហការគ្នា,
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការសរសេរ និងការនិយាយ ជាភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេស ។
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ៧កើត ខែមិគសិរ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣០ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ 

សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : ០៧៧ ៣៥៩ ៩៤៩ /អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

Job Description:
- Achieve the target given by Sale Manager.
- Take care on customer’s relation (requirement, problems solving, documentation).
- Quick response to customer question and well communicate within the team.
- Conduct daily & weekly report and update sale status into company filing system.
- Understand the products and company’s services to full fill customer needs.
- Documents sale by creating or updating customer profile records.
- Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
- Other tasks assign by management
Job Requirement: - Age 20 - 35- Bachelor degree in Business Administrative field or related.- At least 2-year experience in real estate industry.- Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.- Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.- Good behavior, Hardworking, Flexible, Honest and Self-motivated- Able to work under pressure and good at team work.- Knowledge of computer application Microsoft office suite- Good at English or Chinese is plus.Salary and Benefit:- Insurance (NSSF / Life insurance)- Company Trip and Party - 13 month Salary - Sale commission - 18 Days Annual Leave- Sick Leave- Hospitalization Leave- Public Holiday (Follow MoLVT)- Lunch-Birthday cake
Company Profile: GC CITY is subordinate of Golden Cambodian Century Group (GCC). GC City mainly owns land in the city town center of Cambodia and the core area of Sihanoukville, with a total planned development area of more than 2.5 million square meters and an investment of 2 billion US dollars. The current development projects include: Borey NADI by GC City, CEO Wyndham Residence, GC Orussey Market and GC Residence.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070 311616 / 011 311616 s.nich@gc-empire.com National Highway 6, Khtor Village, Phum Preaek Lieb, Sangkat Prek Leap, Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh 12112 070 311616 / 011 311616

Job Description:
• Maintain CEO’s agenda and assist in planning appointments, board meetings, conferences etc.
• Attend general meetings and keep minutes
• Facilitate EXCO meeting by planning agendas, developing and distributing presentations and reports.
• Works closely and effectively with CEO by keeping well
informed of upcoming commitments, responsibilities and
deadlines, following up appropriately.
• Function as liaison between CEO and various
departments to facilities smooth daily company
operation.
• Researches, prioritizes, and follows up on incoming
issues and concerns addressed to the CEO
• Receive and screen phone calls and redirect them when appropriate
• Handle and prioritize all outgoing or incoming correspondence (e-mail, letters, packages etc.)
• Make travel arrangements for executives
• Handle confidential documents ensuring they remain secure
• Monitor office supplies and negotiate terms with suppliers to ensure the most cost-effective orders
• Maintain electronic and paper records ensuring information is organized and easily accessible
• Performed other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in related field.
• At least 1 years of working experience as an assistant in Real Estate Industrial
• Good English proficiency in writing, speaking, listening and reading (Chinese is a plus)
• Good at computer skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint….)
• Good appearance: neat, and professional
• Strong communication skill: open clear, structured and
straight forward
• Strong presentation skill.
• Flexible and able to adapt to change.

Job Description:
- To assist Marketing Manager in the development of the overall digital marketing strategy.
- To implement digital marketing activities across a broad range of digital marketing Channels.
- To manage and maintain the company’s owned media including websites, mobile app, and email/CRM software.
- To manage the creation of relevant and engaging digital content for publishing onto various digital platforms.
- To manage social media marketing campaigns.
- To conduct research on market trends, brand’s audiences and competitors, and end- to-end consumer journey to drive engagements and conversions.
- To analyze digital marketing analytics reports and share insights with the team to develop optimization plans.
- To stay abreast of emerging digital tools and platforms, digital marketing trends, new technologies, and share insights with the rest of the team.
- To report to Marketing Manager;
Job Requirement: - Strong knowledge in Digital Marketing.- At least 1 years’ experience in Marketing.- Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.- Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.- Good behavior, Hardworking, Flexible, Honest and Self-motivate.- Able to work under pressure and good at team work.- Good at English / Japan languages is plus.** Benefits:+ Basic salary+ Allowance+ 13 month Salary + Bonus+ 18days of annual leave+ And other benefit** Working Hour:- Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm (1hour lunch break)- Saturday, 9am to 1pm- Contact Person: HR Department- Email: s.nich@gc-empire.com- Tel: 070 311 616 / 011 311 616- Website: https://gcc-gp.com- Address: Phnom Penh National Highway 6, Khtor Village, Phum Preaek Lieb, Sangkat Prek Leap, Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនាញតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចំណូលសារពើពន្ធ   ចំនួន០២រូប
position: មន្រ្តីជំនាញតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចំណូលសារពើពន្ធ   ចំនួន០២រូប
Job Description:
គុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬខ្ពស់ជាងនេះ ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច, ការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម, គោលនយោបាយសាធារណៈ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោច ០២ ឆ្នាំ ទាក់ទងនឹងការស្រាវជ្រាវ និងវាយតម្លៃ,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងឧបករណ៍វាស់វែង (Tools), វិធីសាស្រ្ត (Methodologies), និងគោលការណ៍ (Principles) នៃការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ (M&E),
- បង្ហាញសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រមូល និងវិភាគទិន្នន័យ,
- មានជំនាញវិភាគគោលនយោបាយ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានទាន់ពេលវេលា,
- មានលទ្ធភាពធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធការងារ,
- ចេះធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងជំរុញក្រុមទាំងមូលឱ្យសហការគ្នា,
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការសរសេរ និងការនិយាយ ជាភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេស ។
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ៧កើត ខែមិគសិរ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣០ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ 

សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖ ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧

Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

Job Description:
- To assist Marketing Manager in the development of the overall digital marketing strategy.
- To implement digital marketing activities across a broad range of digital marketing Channels.
- To manage and maintain the company’s owned media including websites, mobile app, and email/CRM software.
- To manage the creation of relevant and engaging digital content for publishing onto various digital platforms.
- To manage social media marketing campaigns.
- To conduct research on market trends, brand’s audiences and competitors, and end- to-end consumer journey to drive engagements and conversions.
- To analyze digital marketing analytics reports and share insights with the team to develop optimization plans.
- To stay abreast of emerging digital tools and platforms, digital marketing trends, new technologies, and share insights with the rest of the team.
- To report to Marketing Manager;
Job Requirement: - Strong knowledge in Digital Marketing.- At least 1 years’ experience in Marketing.- Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.- Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.- Good behavior, Hardworking, Flexible, Honest and Self-motivate.- Able to work under pressure and good at team work.- Good at English / Chinese languages is plus.** Benefits:+ Basic salary+ Allowance+ 13th month salary+ Bonus+ 18days of annual leave+ And other benefit** Working Hour:- Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm (1hour lunch break)- Saturday, 9am to 1pm- Contact Person: HR Department- Email: s.nich@gc-empire.com- Tel: 070 311 616 / 011 311 616- Website: https://gcc-gp.com- Address: Phnom Penh National Highway 6, Khtor Village, Phum Preaek Lieb, Sangkat Prek Leap, Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: GC CITY is subordinate of Golden Cambodian Century Group (GCC). GC City mainly owns land in the city town center of Cambodia and the core area of Sihanoukville, with a total planned development area of more than 2.5 million square meters and an investment of 2 billion US dollars. The current development projects include: Borey NADI by GC City, CEO Wyndham Residence, GC Orussey Market and GC Residence.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070 311616 / 011 311616 s.nich@gc-empire.com National Highway 6, Khtor Village, Phum Preaek Lieb, Sangkat Prek Leap, Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh 12112 070 311616 / 011 311616

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនាញរៀបចំក្របខណ្ឌហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរយៈពេលមធ្យម ចំនួន០១រូប
position: មន្រ្តីជំនាញរៀបចំក្របខណ្ឌហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរយៈពេលមធ្យម ចំនួន០១រូប
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ     (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។  ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្រ្តីជំនាញរៀបចំក្របខណ្ឌហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរយៈពេលមធ្យម ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញបត្រ ឬអនុបណ្ឌិតផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច, គោលនយោបាយសាធារណៈ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោច ០២ឆ្នាំ ទាក់ទងនឹងការស្រាវជ្រាវ និងរៀបចំក្របខណ្ឌគោលនយោបាយ,
- បង្ហាញសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រមូល និងវិភាគទិន្នន័យ,
- មានជំនាញវិភាគគោលនយោបាយ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានទាន់ពេលវេលា,
- មានលទ្ធភាពធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងនៅក្រោមសម្ពាធខ្ពស់,
- មានសមត្ថភាពល្អក្នុងការសរសេរ និងការនិយាយ ជាភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេស ។
Job Requirement:
ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋាន អ.គ.ហ ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាពខ្ពស់បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន ប៉ុន្តែផ្តល់ជូនអទិភាពជូនដល់មន្រ្តីរាជការដែលស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាដ្ឋាន។

សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។

បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ៧កើត ខែមិគសិរ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣០ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។  ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧

Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

job title: ទីមន្រ្តីជំនាញផ្នែកតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចំណូលមិនមែនសារពើពន្ធ  ចំនួន០១រូប
position: ទីមន្រ្តីជំនាញផ្នែកតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចំណូលមិនមែនសារពើពន្ធ  ចំនួន០១រូប
Job Description:
គុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញបត្រផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច, ការគ្រប់គ្រងអាជីវកម្ម, គោលនយោបាយសាធារណៈ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោច ០២ឆ្នាំ ទាក់ទងនឹងការស្រាវជ្រាវ និងវាយតម្លៃ,
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងឧបករណ៍វាស់វែង (Tools), វិធិសាស្ត្រ (Methodologies), និងគោលការណ៍ (Principles) នៃការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ (M&E),
- បង្ហាញសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រមូល និងវិភាគទិន្នន័យ,
- មានជំនាញវិភាគគោលនយោបាយ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានទាន់ពេលវេលា,
- មានលទ្ធភាពធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងនៅក្រោមសម្ពាធខ្ពស់,
- មានសមត្ថភាពល្អក្នុងការសរសេរ និងការនិយាយ ជាភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេស ។
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ៧កើត ខែមិគសិរ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣០ ខែវិច្ឆិកា ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ 
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : ០៧៧ ៣៥៩ ៩៤៩ /អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

job title: 财务人员 (1 名) / ជំនួយការផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ (​១នាក់) ( 450$ - 800$)
company_name: 四川省第三建筑工程（柬埔寨）有限公司 / SICHUAN PROVINE NO.3 CONTRAUCTION  ( CAMBODIA) CO,.LTD.
position: 财务人员 (1 名) / ជំនួយការផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ (​១នាក់) ( 450$ - 800$)
Job Description:
* 任职要求:
- 大学学历，会计、财务、经济学等相关专业毕业
- 能熟练操作电脑，熟练运用 office 软件
- 中文打字、读写流利，善于学习，服从工作安排
- 有财务相关工作经验者优先。

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Job Description:
•	Manage the school’s Primary and Secondary libraries and literacy improvement programmes at all campuses. 
•	Prepare, present and monitor the yearly library budget.
•	Ensure continuous improvement of all library services and maintain a conducive environment for all library users in the libraries at all times.
•	Provide frequent library usage orientation to all students and staff members, in particular in terms of library sections, research tools, digital library platforms and Lexile levels.
•	Develop digital library options and promote the usage of those throughout the community
•	Plan and deliver library classes, e.g. research workshops, literacy circles and reading sessions
•	Assist in the selection and lead the implementation of a school-wide library management system
•	Provide training in the usage of the library management system
•	Serve as the contact person for any matter related to the library management system and work closely with the provider.
•	Ensure continuous improvement of the libraries by adding books, subscriptions, research tools, etc. using the analysis of student MAP test and library usage data.
•	Coordinate the book purchase process and ensure that students and teachers are systematically requested to provide their book requests.
•	Propose changes to the facilities and design of the libraries and the libraries of future campuses as the school community expands.
•	Provide the community engagement team with materials than can be used to promote literacy and the library via social and other media
•	Liaise with national and international book sellers, public and private national and international libraries, literacy NGOs and other institutions that the school can partner with to improve and promote literacy among the school community.
•	Develop and implement specific literacy and library campaigns targeted to the literary improvement needs of the students
•	Engage in community events to promote love for reading
•	Collect, analyze and present all relevant data related to the activities of the usage of the libraries.
•	Engage in the continuous improvement cycle of the WASC accreditation processes and take ownership of the library related activities as stated in the school-wide action plan
•	Support the National Programme leadership in supporting literacy initiatives for Khmer language.
Job Requirement:
•	Cambodian only
•	Bachelor Degree in Education, Library Studies, Communication, Language Art or relevant fields. 
•	High level of English proficiency  
•	Experience or trained in data management and/or library management systems
•	Compassionate, organized, flexible and a team player
•	Excellent record of professional and personal integrity
•	Experience/certified to teach English is a plus
•	Experience working in an international school setting is a plus
•	Ability to work under different priority lines and in multicultural and diverse working environments
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.

Job Description:
-	Manage effectively the audit team and carrying out audits of all projects of MAM, which cover in Phnom Penh and Province areas as planned.
-	Independently assessing, evaluating and consulting to the management in relation to the internal control system and managing risks to add value and improve the overall business operations of the MAM projects.
-	Examining any weaknesses and/or potential weaknesses in the line management (policy, procedures or operational activities) based on the risk rating (critical or major), which may impact to the business operations of the MAM. If any major weaknesses and / or potential weaknesses, discuss the weaknesses with the line manager.
-	Proposing and updating the Internal Audit Procedures of each assigned project as necessary.
-	Acting as a consultant to all the MAM projects, particularly ensuring that organization, policies, standard operating procedures, accounting principles, business process, risk management, internal control, governance and information systems are appropriately aligned to achieve the MAM goals effectively and efficiently, and in a manner that contains risks to an acceptable level.
-	Being liaison officer to external parties of the MAM in relation to internal audit function.
-	Review the internal audit report and submit to the Head of Internal Audit for final review.
-	Providing coaching note to subordinates upon the review of audit work.
-	Assist Deputy/Head Department for annual audit planning.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor Degree in finance or Accounting, CAT/ACCA, or related fields.
-	Good English writing or Chinese is considered as priority.
-	Experience at least two and three years for Supervisor Audit respectively.
-	Willing to travel and work in provinces for a period of time.
-	Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply for the position of Auditor.
-	Accomplishment of audit work following the schedule as planned. 
-	Good team work with respect of audit ethic.
-	Contribute feedback/idea to the audit department on potential process enhancements where team improvement is possible.
-	Computer Literate (Microsoft office and quick book).
Company Profile:
Mega Asset Management Co., Ltd is a leading consulting company founded since 2008, specialized in Real Estate Development with many prestigious projects on hands. We are managing Property and Asset including Overseas Cambodia Investment Corporation (OCIC) or Chroy Chang Va Satellite City, Diamond Island City, Olympia City, Condominium, Wedding hall, Exhibition Center, Hotel, Construction, Infrastructure, Agricultural business and so on.

Our vision
To be the leading consultant company for Real Estate Development, Property and Asset Management.  

Our Mission
To provide professional experts and to be the partner of choice with value-added management in all the areas of real estates development and property and asset management.
