company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ• បោសសម្អាត រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុ កៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យតាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ• បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ• បញ្ចូលកាតាឡុកសៀវភៅ• អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ• គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា• ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ• ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ខ្ចី-សងសៀវភៅ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា កត់ត្រាកំណត់ហេតុអង្គប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំខែ• បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ)• ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• រាប់ស្តុកសៀវភៅ• ចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការអគារប្រចាំខែ• ចងក្រងប្រវត្តិសកម្មភាពដែលមានក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន (ចំពោះតាមសាខាប្រគល់ទៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល)• ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បង្កើតសកម្មភាពជម្រុញអំណាន និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីបណ្ណាល័យ (យ៉ាងតិច៤សកម្មភាពក្នុង១ឆ្នាំ)• រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យទៅតាមព្រឹត្តិការណ៍សកម្មភាពបណ្ណាល័យ និងបុណ្យប្រពៃណីជាតិ និងអន្តរជាតិ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម• ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ និងចុះបញ្ជីសៀវភៅចូល• ជួយការងារផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមការស្នើសុំជាក់ស្តែង• ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ (សម្រាប់តែបណ្ណាល័យ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង)
Job Requirement: • ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ• ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស• ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Provincial Sales Manager (Based in Kampong Cham)
position: Provincial Sales Manager (Based in Kampong Cham)
Job Description:
• Lead and develop members of your team utilizing the tools and processes developed by HR
• Ensure that the leadership and development of the people in your team is given sufficient time and focus 
• Proactively act as a coach and mentor to your team to enable them to improve their skills and knowledge 
• Identify and resolve employee/team problems and conflict 
• Support in the recruitment of suitable people for your team and the company as a whole 
• Act as a ‘subject matter expert’ in your area of expertise, sharing that knowledge on Sales Operations to your team & colleagues
• Ensure you continue to develop your knowledge and expertise through your own ‘personal career development’ and utilizing training and development offered by company
• Act as an advocate of the company, promoting it internally and externally. This includes creating and managing any social media to share, like and comment on the company’s published content.
• Direct, motivate, & support professional sales team to accomplish their objectives 
• Manage sales activities and daily sales deal status in Odoo-CRM, expenses reporting, and cross-functional reporting (Such as Stock, Service, BPO, etc.) with own area of responsibility. Grow network with own area of responsibility
• Accountable for ensuring all RMA’s policies and procedure are follow within the showrooms and/or responsible area.
• Advise sales team through the sales process, including but not limited to prospecting -> closing area
• Coach and mentor sales team on the following topics; including but not limited to needs, features & benefits, closing deals, time and territory management, negotiating, product knowledge, and productivity improvement
• Create and monitor annual sales department benchmarks and budget, in alignment with the organization’s financial and operational objectives
• Ensure customer satisfaction. Work with the sales team to know the customer’s current and future expectations (Customer Talk) and work with all departments to resolve customer concern/issue.
• Lead the sales team to effectively understand and use manufacturer’s products and programs to attain acceptable market share levels.
• Foster an engaged work environment within the locations, encouraging accountability, open communication, teamwork, and a commitment to serving the customer.
• Ensure that the company/location reputation and image in the community is consistent with RMA/AED Integrated Core Values, and that business relationships with all stakeholders are not compromised
• Responsible for ensuring that sound and safe business practices and processes are implemented and continuously improved to effectively and efficiently achieve ethical business objectives
• Perform all other duties as assigned by management in a professional and efficient manner.
• Full responsible for P & L of own department/area of responsibility
• Manage costs at reasonable levels and in line with Budget
• Actively advise any concerns related to profitability of Sales Department
• Report to TSM/DGM 
• Meet with Aftersales, Marketing, and other Sales Dept., regularly to evaluate inter-departmental concerns on skills and performance required for each individual for improvement 
• Closely liaise with RMA Group on policy matters
• Develop and maintain good relationships with customers, business partners, networking people, government and private sectors
• This position is based in province (s), and  required to travel (>60%) to visit and support sales team in own province (s) of responsibility, require regular routine calendar and respond to urgent needs as per business operations’ requirement 
• Hold valid Driving License
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree level in Business Management  or related fields, especially Agriculture business
• Minimum of 2 years of experiences in Sales or related field
• Record in successfully running Sales Dept. or related field
• Have good knowledge in Agriculture and/or Heavy equipment
• Ability to lead, training, and coach subordinate well 
• Listening, Understanding and Responding
• Mentoring, Coaching & Performance Management 
• Knowledge of business Environment
• Achievement
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Excellent presentation and facilitation skills
• A person of good character – someone in whom the owner/manager can place full trust and confidence
• Ability to use MS office applications – Power Point, Word, Excel & Outlook
• Ability to build relationships with internal and external partners
• Excellent organization skills – able to prioritize
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

-	Be patient and working hard.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse

- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits

- Career advancement opportunities

- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៏នៃការជួបអិតិថិជនទៀងទាត់ទៅកាន់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
- កំណត់អតិថិជនគោលដៅសំខាន់ៗ នឹងផ្តល់មតិកែលម្អលើសកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយដោយផ្អែកទៅលើព័ត៌មានដែលប្រមូលបាន
- សហការយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយថ្នាក់លើដែរពាក់ព័ន្ឋ​ ដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការ អនុវត្តយុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត និងសកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ស្របតាមផលិតផល និងតំបន់ដែលបានកំណត់
- ជួយកសាងកេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះក្រុមហ៊ុន និងកេត្តនាមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន​​នៅក្នុងតំបន់ដែលបានកំណត់
- រក្សាការសម្របសម្រួលដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពជាមួយថ្នាក់លើ ដើម្បីវាយតម្លៃសមិទ្ធផល និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពនៃសកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយ
- សហការជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គងផលិតផលនៃស្តុកនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងនិងការព្យាករណ៏នៃការលក់
- បង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងជិតស្និតជាមួយអតិថិជនគោលដៅ​និងទំនាក់ទំនងដើម្បីបង្កើតការលក់នៅតាមតំបន់
- បង្កើតការលក់ប្រចាំខែ​និងត្រីមាស​នៃផលិតផលទៅតាមតំបន់ដែរបានកំណត់

** ការស្ទង់មតិទីផ្សារ
-  រៀបចំផែនការនិងស្ទង់សកម្មភាពដៃគូរប្រកួតប្រជែងនៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យ គ្លីនិក ជាមួយវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិត​ និងឱសថការីដើម្បីពិភាក្សារសម្មភាពផ្សេងៗ
-  ប្រមួលទិន្នន័យនិងព័ត៌មានជាក់លាក់តាមការណែនាំរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
** ការអប់រំនិងបទពិសោធន៏ដែលត្រូវការ
- កម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រ
- បទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកលក់​1​ទៅ2ឆ្នាំ ឬផ្នែកទីផ្សារឱសថជាចំាបាច់

** តម្រូវការ និងចំណេះដឹង
- ការយល់ដឹងអំពីធុរៈកិច្ច​​ និងរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធផ្នែកឱសថ​ និងការថែទាំសុខភាព គឺជាកត្តាចំាបាច់
- ជំនាញបញ្ចេកទេសដែលត្រូវការ
ជំនាញកំព្យូរទ័ររួមទាំង Ms Word, Ms Excel spreadsheet, Power Point software ជាកត្តាចាំបាច់
- ជំនាញអន្តរបុគ្គលដែរត្រូវការ

- សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការរៀនបានលឿន​ និងមានផ្នត់គំនិតវិជ្ជមាន
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការធ្វើបទបង្ហាញនិងទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អ
- លើកទឹកចិត្តខ្លួនឯង ការច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការរៀបចំមានរបៀបរាបរយ
- មានជំនាញអន្តរបុគ្គលល្អ តម្រង់ទិសដៅអិតិថិជន
- សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការធ្វើដំណើរ និងធ្វើរទស្សនកិច្ចជាទៀងទាត់ទៅកាន់អិតិថិជនគោលដៅ

**  ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់ជូនដូចជា
- ប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៏
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចំាខែ
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំត្រីមាស
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពផ្នែកវេជ្ជសាស្រ្ត
- និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៏ជាច្រើនទៀត បើប្រៀបធៀបទៅនិងទីផ្សារ

មានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៏សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបឬទំនាក់ទំនងមកកាន់dsm@spey.com.kh ឬតាមអាសយដ្ធាន

Job Description: •	Effective implement action plans to achieve department KPI•	Effective implement maintenance Galvaman factory machineries•	Routine inspect and monitor electrical components and equipment for fault•	Provide effective and efficient service support and troubleshoot to Galvaman factory•	Implement all items machine checklist related to breakdown and repair•	Ensure production equipment are in good condition to run smoothly•       Work with relevant department to build up and ensure company 5s and safely policies and adhered within Galvaman factory process•       Improve cultural maturity, capability increase to achieve no accident due to violation of company 5s and safety policies•	Other tasks as assigned.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor degree in electrical engineering (automation) or equivalent•	Minimum 2 to 3 year's experience in electrical engineering/ automation in manufacturing•	Being a team player with positive attitude•	Willing to do manual work and support team at shop floor during breakdown time•	Good command of English (writing and speaking)•	Knowledge in Ms. Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint).Competitive offer:•	Annual Salary Increment•	Annual Performance Bonus•	Learning and Development•	Lunch Allowance•	Coffee serve•	Group Personal Accident Insurance (Forte)•	Working Accident and Health care Insurance (NSSF)•	Company Events•	Uniforms•	Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Company Profile:
Founded under the principle of innovation, FUXIN is Cambodia's first pre-engineered steel buildings manufacturer for industrial application, commercial and retail outlets, storage, logistics, sports and leisure structures.

We thrive to be leader in supplying steel building solutions that are more superior in quality, more cost efficient, more time-saving and environmentally sustainable.

A member of ISI GROUP, FUXIN builds upon extensive experience and expertise of the Group in the area of manufacturing and industrial development. Today we have completed over 450 projects including some of the country’s most well-known projects Aeon Mall Sen Sok Parking Structure, and International Exhibition Hall.

Job Description: 1.ត្រូវធានាបានថាដំណើរការរបស់អាហារដ្ឋានដំណើរការទៅរលូន និង ត្រូវធានាបានថាអាហារដ្ឋានមានរបៀបរៀបរយ មានអនាម័យល្អ ការរៀបចំបានស្អាតល្អប្រសើរ2.ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ចេញទិញចូល របាយការណ៍បញ្ជាទិញ និងរបាយការណ៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលបានកំណត់3.ត្រូវរៀបចំផែនការងារបុគ្គលិកអាហារដ្ឋាន ផែនការអាជីវកម្មអាហារដ្ឋាន និង រៀបចំផែនការថវិកា និង អនុវត្តដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូ គោលបំណង4.ត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមដានមាតិយល់បល់សិស្ស បុគ្គលិក និងធ្វើការកែប្រែចំណុចខ្វះខាត5. អនុវត្តតាមការសម្រេចរបស់ គណៈកម្មាធិការអាហារដ្ឋាន
Job Requirement: 1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រតិបត្តិការអាហារដ្ឋានរបស់សាលាអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ2. ដឹកនាំការងារជាក្រុម ដើម្បីប្រសិទ្ធភាពការងារ និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព3. រៀបចំផែនការ និងអនុវត្តដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលបំណងរបស់អាហារដ្ឋាន4. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ចំណូលនិងចំណាយរបស់អាហារដ្ឋាន5. បង្កើតបរិយាកាសការងារល្អសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក6. ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូនបុគ្គលិក និងនិស្សិតទាំងអស់7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្តុកប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ 8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទំនិញទិញចូលប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍9.ត្រួតពិនិត្យឡើងវិញម៉ឺនុយអាហារដ្ឋានប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍10.ត្រួតពិនិត្យដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាម្ហូបអាហារនិងភេសជ្ជៈប្រចាំថ្ងៃ11.ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍អំពីទិន្នន័យម្ហូបអាហារប្រចាំថ្ងៃប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍12.បែងចែកទួនាទីភារកិច្ចទទួលខុសត្រូវបុគ្គលិកសម្រាប់អាហារដ្ឋាន13.ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានចាត់ការទូទៅ(GM)

Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities:•	Provide support of the leadership in the delivery of reliable, accurate, timely and well informed advice pertaining to legal issues and the potential legal implications of business transactions, initiative and projects and various corporate strategies within the Organization –. •	 Review and advice management on legal implications of internal policies, corporate secretary works/assignments and procedures for Insurance matters. •	Review all contracts and assess legal implications that need to be brought to the executive management’s attention. •	Perform corporate secretarial duties and responsibilities in respect of ELIC as required by corporate laws statues and various regulations and governance requirements pertaining to Cambodian Laws generally or the insurance regulator of Cambodia (Ministry of Economy and Finance (MEF) or its equivalent, specifically
Job Requirement: •	A Law Degree •	Qualifies to act as Secretary (if applicable under Cambodian Law) •	At least 3 – 5 years of experience relevant post qualifications working experience, preferably in legal firms, in house lawyers in insurance & takaful companies or financial institutions. •	Additional exposure/experience in regulatory compliance/advisory matters will be a beneficial and added advantage; •	Strong problem solving skills, detail oriented with the ability to understand multiple perspectives, identify and negotiate solutions across the organization. •	High level of knowledge and skills on corporate secretarial matters. •	Able to provide expert advice on corporate governance matters. •	Key leadership attributes working in a collaborative and solutions based mind set
Company Profile: Why Work with Us: Etiqa Life Insurance (Cambodia) PLC., a member of Maybank Group, is a leading ASEAN insurer with presence in Cambodia, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, and the Philippines. Our longer term plan is to become a leading life insurer providing innovative and inclusive financial protection solutions to the market, which is in line with the government’s financial inclusiveness strategy. Etiqa, on the other hand, is a place that values hard-work, agility, consistency, and inclusivity by which equal opportunity is given to every single one in the company.   As we are constantly accelerating our growth in Cambodia, we are looking for an ambitious candidate to join us as Attractive package is available for the chosen candidate.

Job Description:
• Perform sales duties and assist with overall sales tasks.
• Responsible for supervising, managing and motivating team members daily.
• Set clear team goals, delegate tasks and set deadlines and monitor team performance to achieve and surpass individual and team sales targets and goals.
• Conduct team meetings to increase individual and team success.
• Prepares weekly and monthly reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information.
• Review weekly forecast with sales management.
• Assist and deal with sales and non-sale problems with other related parties.
• Train, coach, discipline and motivate team members to refine and improve ongoing team success.
• Perform other tasks as assigned by Sales Manager and Assistant to MD.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Management, Sales and Marketing or related fields.
• At least 2-3 years working experience in sales condo, villa of real estate company.
• Strong attention to detail and excellent organization skills.
• Good negotiation and persuasion skills, interpersonal and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to manage and influence team members.
• Be friendly, flexible, hard-working, and able to work under the pressure.
• Ability to use Microsoft Office programs including, Word and Excel, Outlook, PPT, etc.
• Strong interpersonal skills with a positive attitude toward working with the team.
• Ability to handle customers efficiently.
• Ability to communicate well in written and verbal Khmer and English.
• Good morale and integrity.

Job Description:
1.	Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs.
2.	Plan, develop and organize the construction effort to formulate the most cost-effective plan to timely completion within budget and to implement the execution of that plan
3.	Coordinating and supervising construction workers, subcontractors and work activities
4.	Preparing the site with other construction professionals such as architects, engineers and surveyors before the construction work starts;
5.	Selecting tools and materials (Make a test of the tools before decided to buy it)
6.	Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
7.	Checking and preparing site reports 
8.	Assessing and minimizing risk
9.	Finding ways to prevent problems and to solve any that crop up
10.	Maintaining quality control procedures
11.	Keeping staff motivated and focused
12.	Another task assigns by project manager or project director.
Job Requirement:
1.	Bachelor Degree’s or Master Degree’s in Civil Engineering or other related fields
2.	At least 5 years’ experiences in related filed
3.	Exceptional ability to monitor construction project budgets and deadlines
4.	Advanced negotiation skills to procure cost-effective subcontractors and suppliers
5.	Experience in relaying detailed instructions to onsite construction teams
6.	Knowledgeable of construction safety regulations
7.	Good knowledge of building methods and regulations
8.	Decision-making ability and team motivation
9.	Good communication in English.

Job Description:
Major tasks and responsibilities of position: 
1. Manage tax planning for all of business divisions and provide innovative tax solution to complex tax issues
2. Identify and mitigate tax risks
Manage to prepare internal tax procedure and follow the updates from tax department
3. Consolidate and review monthly and annual tax submission within timeframe for all divisions
4. Manage and coordinate tax queries and tax audits (desk audit, limited audit and comprehensive) from tax authorities
5. Filling and perform annual declaration of commercial enterprise to ministry of commerce
6. Manage and responsible for safe keeping and updating of all legal documents
7. Other tasks will be assigned by direct manager
Job Requirement:
Qualifications (Education, skills, experiences and personal characteristics necessary for success in this position)
1. Education: Bachelor degree in a business accounting, business Administration, economic and other relevant field
2. At least 3 or 4 years of tax experiences or in a similar role
3. Proven experience in interacting, negotiating, and building relationships with tax officers
4. Highly confident, technically competent, and able to communicate convincingly to tax officer
5. English Proficiency: Good, able to communicate in English Exposure to international and managing     lead times
6. Computer literacy in MS. Office, Internet and Email
7. Others:
- Demonstrable business ethics and deep understanding of regulatory requirements
- Ability to multi-tasking and strong personnel management skill
- Comfortable working in a demanding matrix environment
- Self-starting with a proactive, can-do attitude

Job Description:
- Development and ensuring healthy work relationships and a supportive atmosphere at the workplace.
- Collect and analyze employee data, all type of documents related to employees.
- Leading of negotiations between the organization and employees.
- Handling employee complaints and raising to line manager.
- Liaising between employees and management.
- Understand legal requirements and the necessary technical and communication skills.
- Support in conducting exit interviews for departing employees to ensure that the valid reasons are captured through the process.
- Arrange for employee physical examination, first aid, and other medical attention.
- Prepare reports and updates medical, insurance, retirement, and other personnel forms and records.
- Perform other related duties as assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
1. Education: Bachelor degree in business, HR management or any other related field
2. At least 2 years of experiences or in a similar position advantageous
3. Listening skills as well as the ability to understand people's background and motives
4. Ability to present information and bargain with employees and managers from different levels
5. Proficiency in MS office, internet and email
6. Good English language and Chinese is a plus
7. Good problem-solving ability and able to work under pressure


Working days and benefits
Working days
1.   Monday to Friday - 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
2.   Saturday - 8:00am to 12:00pm (half day)

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
Procurement 
1. Handle the Procurement of Decoration and Contruction services;
•	Assist to prepare BOQ (Bill of Quantities) and RFQ (Request For Quotation) packages for selection purposes.
•	Assist to evaluate construction/decoration materials including prices, quality, and the availability in the market. 
•	Assist to clarify the BOQ and negotiate with vendors on the price quotation.
•	Asist to prepare the Procurement analysis and the selection process. 
•	Assist to the Procurement Support team to review and prepare contractual documents with selected vendor.
•	Assist to the Procurement Support team to prepare periodic selection of minor issue repairment or decoration.
•	Liaise and follow up with vendors for timely delivery.
•	Conduct site visit on random projects.
•	Ad hoc duties including supplier payment pressing, vendor feedback collection, and any other duties as assigned.
2. Handle the Procurement of Production items (i.e. Marketing tools, OCS desk, Sofa for VIP room, Logistic tools, Printing forms...etc);
•	Assist to prepare criteria/expectation checklist, and prepare RFQ (Request For Quotation) packages for selection purposes.
•	Assist to evaluate the material including prices, quality, and the availability in the market (on site). 
•	Assist to prepare the scoring, comparison, and the selection process. 
•	Assist to the Procurement Support team to review and prepare contractual documents with selected vendor (if needed).
•	Liaise and follow up with vendors for timely delivery.
•	Ad hoc duties including supplier payment pressing, supplier site visits, and any other duties as assigned.

3. Handle the disposal item bidding process (i.e. vehicle, motorbike, scape value items...etc);
•	Work with the Inventory unit and technical teams to find the estimate/starting price of the disposal items.
•	Form up Committee and prepare neccessary documents i.e. bidding conditions, announcement flyers..etc for approval.
•	Make an Announcement; make sure it notifies well/clearly to potential tenders.
•	Evaluate the price proposal and prepare the comparison.
•	Prepare documents close out the bidding.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor of Business Administration, Bachelor of Finance and Banking, or equivalent
•	Minimum 2 years in procurement.
•	Very good English and communication skills.
•	ERP system or other Procurement system usage. 
•	Basic computer skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, internet and email).
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
_Promote Amret products and brand name among targeted communities and potential customers for deposit, credit products and other financial services in assigned operating area with a view to delivering clear, transparent and accurate information to each customer.

_Train clients in targeted areas of financial planning and consult on credit matter to ensure quality payments.

_Understand and apply credit policies and processes including analysis of client business risk and environmental and social risk to achieve quantity and quality objectives.

_Monitor deposit performance regularly to ensure sales target achieved.

_Check loan repayment schedule daily to ensure reimbursements are on time along with following up disbursements to make sure that the status of clients is updated and any problems promptly solved.

_Provide services to customers based on good communication and ethical behavior.

_Build and maintain good relationships with prospects, customers and local authorities to ensure that customer satisfaction is enriched.

_Collect customer feedbacks and competitor information such as product/service features, pricing etc. in the purpose of providing constructive comments to direct supervisor for improvement.

_File documents and cash clearance records to ensure that daily transactions comply with credit, treasury and internal control policies and procedures.
Job Requirement:
_Associate degree or equivalent qualification in banking, finance, marketing or related field

_Non-experienced and experienced are encourage to apply

_Good verbal and written communication in both Khmer and English

_High commitment and able to work under pressure.

Job Description:
To carry out the reception and control of merchandise and its storage in the stockroom, in addition to store replenishment according to company procedures, in order to ensure the store has the right product at the right time.

RESPONSIBILITIES
STOCKROOM MANAGEMENT
• To receive and confirm boxes every day in an optimal manner.
• To open the boxes received in an organised and systematic manner, according to store needs.
• To organise and allocate the merchandise received according to stockroom guidelines.
• To perform daily replenishment on a continual basis, according to store needs.
• To reorganise stockroom space in an optimal manner according to the stage of the season and store needs – start of the season, sale period, etc.
• Responsibility for maintaining a clean and tidy stockroom.
• To carry out the re-labelling of garments as required (sale period, promotions, etc.).
• To perform transfers and pickings quickly and specifically according to instructions from managers.
• To participate actively and systematically in the end of season return, according to company guidelines.
• Responsibility for controlling and monitoring stockroom materials - alarms, Pathfinder, adhesive tape, etc.
• To collaborate in other store maintenance tasks, as required.o be able to deal with individual store requests quickly and efficiently.
PRODUCT
• To be familiar with the products of each season - collection, initial order, colours, sizes, etc.
• To use the different product lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, transmission, initial order, etc.).
• To participate in updating the Merchandising and Rotation rail.
• To collaborate in preparing all the material required to perform the store changes.
• To be able to recommend alternative garments when out of stock items are requested.
• To report to the team any issues that may affect sales (entries of repetitions, catalogue garments, etc.).
• Responsibility for organising and re-allocating surplus clothing.
• To be aware at all times of the newest products and what has been withdrawn to the stockroom.
• To deal with flaws in accordance with company standards.
Job Requirement:
• Proactive and able to take the initiative.
• Organised with a certain degree of autonomy.
• Flexible, adapts to the needs of the stockroom and the store.
• Good communicator – listens actively and communicates in a clear and structured manner.
• Manages his/her time efficiently.
• Committed and willing to improve.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Goods reception and handling standards and protocol.
• Procedure for transfers and goods returns.
• To be familiar with the different lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, initial order, out of stock items, repetitions, etc.).
• Partial inventories protocol.
• Basic Customer Service Standards.
• The entire collection - references, models, sizes, colours, etc.
• The Rankings and the most important product lists – Best Sellers, replenishments, etc.
• Organisation and application.
• Able to prioritise and commercially oriented.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. job title: Store Manager (Aeon Mall Sen Sok City)
position: Store Manager (Aeon Mall Sen Sok City)
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To act as a role model for the management of the store team.
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.

• To ensure the development of the team towards a high level of knowledge and performance.

• To detect the potential of each employee and ensure their development.
• To ensure the optimal management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• To lead the team and correctly and actively manage potential conflict.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To plan the required measures to reach targets.
• To analyze and review management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• To priorities and, during busy periods, dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To ensure the correct execution of administrative tasks.
• To review and apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.).
• To ensure strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To optimize resources and try to minimize expenses e.g. optimization of the workforce, suppliers, etc.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.)
• To ensure and collaborate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To optimise selling space in order to obtain maximum profitability.
• To continuously ensure the correct replenishment of the store.
• To ensure compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).

• Analysis of management indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register program and Pathfinder operation.
• E Leadership qualities – mobilizes and motivates the team.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organization, management and planning.
• Able to analyze and offer solutions.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Prioritization – optimal use of time.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.

Thank you for visiting our homepage. Woori Accounting is an elite accounting firm headquartered in Cambodia with offices conveniently located in Thailand and Myanmar. Job Description:
o	Receive cash from daily sales and prepare sales report (Collection Daily Report). Take it to deposit at the ABA Bank account. Note: All cash received after 3:00PM will be included with the next day.
o	Scan daily sales documents (Excel, System and Bank Slip) into the network folder.
o	All Credit Memos that are deducted with the invoice is required to be deducted both in the Collection Daily Report and in the System.
o	Prepare weekly sale invoices in order numbering for supervisor and accounting team
o	Prepare a monthly Petty Cash Log and submit it to the Accounting HQ (AP) on a monthly basis. All excess or deficient expenses must be reported to the Accounting (AP) and for additional cash request must be made 4 days in advance, accompanied by an expense report and expense Documents.
o	Record the daily petty cash expense <$50 into excel and system.
o	Perform daily cash counts at the end of each day.
o	Other tasks as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
o	BA in Accounting, Finance or any related fields.
o	At least 2 year working experience in stock control and Cashier.
o	Highly personable, with the ability to quickly build relationships
o	Be able to work under pressure. 
o	Communication skills in speaking/Writing English. 
o	Knowledge of computer literacy (Microsoft office word, Power point, Excel) 
o	Good interpersonal and Communication skills. 
o	Strong skill in organization
o	Very patience, Flexible, Honest and Friendly 
o	Working Hours: Monday to Saturday, 7:30am to 5:30pm.
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Are you a dynamic professional with a passion for success who is looking for an opportunity that will take your career to a whole new level? If yes, we wish to invite you to apply for the follow positions:

Company Profile:
Amary Co., Ltd is fully accredited travel & tour operating company licensed by the Ministry of Tourism and Ministry of Commerce, Cambodia.  It is one of the oldest and leading One Stop Travel Organization established in 1997 with a vision to provide “TOTAL TRAVEL SERVICES” to the people of Cambodia and to the rest of the clients from the world.  It is providing a variety of services, which are being looked after by qualified and highly competent staff to provide personalized services concerning the client's travel and tour requirements within the country and abroad. We offer tour packages and arrange customized trips covering regional flights, transfers, hotel bookings, tours and car rental arrangements.  

Amary is an International Air Transport Association (IATA) Accredited Agent and also an active member of CATA (Cambodia Association of Travel Agents).  

Amary’s excellent profile and reputation in Cambodia has been honored through our high working standard, services and staff with multi-language speaking guides.  The Office is fully equipped with modern infrastructure to meet the complete travel solutions nationally and internationally.  It has build excellent relations with all the major Airlines and Hotels, which helps facilitating in confirming all travel reservations, ticketing, hotel reservations, tour services, transportation etc.

But, can give advice to manager if thinking

- Tel. 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555
- Email: careers@cellcard.com.kh
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Description:
- Conducts concept and usability testing and gather feedback
- Creates personas through user research and data
- Defines the right interaction model and evaluate its success
- Develops wireframes and prototypes around customer needs
- Finds creative ways to solve UX problems (e.g. usability, findability)
- Works with UI designers to implement attractive designs
- Works with all the project stakeholders during the full life cycle of the project to ensure high quality user experience of the delivery
- Understands product specifications and user psychology
- Keeps abreast of competitor products and industry trends
- Performs other duties as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related fields
- Strong portfolio of design projects
- Familiar with design thinking concept: planning and conducting user research, user testing, A/B testing, prototyping, heuristic analysis, usability and accessibility concerns.
- Ability to lead and facilitate design sprint with the stakeholder
- Ability to clearly and effectively communicate, present and defend design processes, ideas, and solutions to teams and/or senior management
- Expertise in standard UX software like: Sketch, Invision, Axure, Balsamiq and/or similar 
- Problem-solving aptitude
- Analytical mind with a business acumen
- Be open to receive feedback and constructive criticism
- Knowledge of HTML/CSS; JavaScript is a plus
- English proficiency
- Computer literacy
- Be flexible, dynamic and team work

Qualified applicants may submit their CVs and cover letters to the Human Resources Department.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Description:

- At least 2-year experience in real estate industry.
- Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.
- Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.
- Good behavior, Hardworking, Flexible, Honest and Self-motivated
- Able to work under pressure and good at team work.

Job Description:
1.	Achieve category sales, profit and income goals and objectives through implementing strategic business plans for the assigned categories.
2.	Implement and manage an optimum product mix that focuses on customers’ needs.  
3.	Implement promotional plans that bring excitement and incremental sales to the stores. 
4.	Implement a competitive pricing strategy that delivers value to our customers. 
5.	Establish collaborative retailer/supplier relationships to maximize income/terms/discounts to improve sales and profitability of category. 
6.	Achieve reduction in shrink budget objectives through disciplined buying and inventory management processes.
7.	Achieve the targeted customer service standards in the area of supply days and products mix in order to meet and exceed the customers’ expectation. 
8.	Participate, communicate and support a culture of learning, teamwork and sharing internally and externally with the stores, Norm business units.
Job Requirement:
- Experienced at retail business, health and beauty product is a plus
- At least 3 years experienced of purchasing or merchandise
- Ability to handle multi tasks and complexities as per number of different projects will be implemented at the same time
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

- Siem Reap

- ណែនាំផលិតផល និងទំនិញប្រកបដោយសុជីវធម៌
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យស្តុកទំនិញ និងទុកឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការបញ្ជាទិញស្តុក និងការលក់ដែលបានគ្រោងទុកប្រចាំខែ
- ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនមានសាច់ប្រាក់មិនគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ឬបង្កាន់ដៃមានបញ្ហា
- ជូនដំណឹងទៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាលនៅពេលប្រតិបត្តិការកាតឥណទានមានបញ្ហា ឬប្រព័ន្ធគិតលុយមានបញ្ហា
- បង្ហាត់បង្រៀនបុគ្គលិកថ្មី និងផ្តួចផ្តើមគំនិតដើម្បីថែទាំបុគ្គលិកថ្មី
- សម្អាត និងដាក់ឧបករណ៍ដែលបានប្រើប្រាស់រួចត្រឡប់ទៅកន្លែងដើមវិញ
- កិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងហាង ។
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬនិស្សិតសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- ត្រូវមានភាពបត់បែនបន្ទាន់បាន ក្នុងការផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនការងារម្តងម្កាល
- ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងចូលចិត្តធ្វើការជាក្រុម
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំក្នុងការលក់រាយ ឬផ្សារទំនើប

*ម៉ោងការងារ:
- វេនព្រឹក (05:30 AM - 02:30 PM)
- វេនរសៀល​ (01:30 PM - 10:30 PM)
- វេនយប់ (09:30 PM - 06:30 AM)
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

- កិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងហាង ។

Job Description:
Personal Assistant is responsible for performing secretarial work and provide senior managers with day-to-day administrative support. The duties include answering phone calls and managing correspondence, scheduling appointments, and making travel arrangements. The duties may also be required to organize events.

I. Job Description:
- Assist the Executive Director in the timely management of communications including written, telephone, email, and voicemail.
- Support the Executive Director by providing a high standard of personal executive level assistance to meet the needs of the Executive Director’s objectives, including a significant amount of diary management, setting up meetings, hospitality, travel, and visa arrangements.
- Manage and coordinate travel for both business and personal arrangements.
- Implementing and maintaining procedures/administrative systems.
- Managing internal and external correspondence on behalf of senior management.
- Preparing communications on behalf of senior management.
- Support in coordination of projects by capturing timelines, strategies, and delivering progress updates.
- Other tasks as assigned by Executive Director.
Job Requirement:
- Previous experience in a customer engagement, Personal Assistant, Secretary or similar role.
- Creative problem solving, outstanding organizational, and time management skills.
- Ability to speak effectively among executives, clients, customers, and employees.
- Ability to resolve complex administrative problems independently and perform other tasks that are diverse and advanced.
- Can speak Thai is a plus.

Job Description: • Plan an event from start to finish according to requirements, target audience and objectives• Come up with suggestions to enhance the event’s success• Prepare budgets and ensure adherence• Source and negotiate with vendors and suppliers• Coordinate all operations• Lead promotional activities for the event• Supervise all staff (event coordinators, caterers etc.)• Approve all aspects before the day of the event• Ensure event is completed smoothly and step up to resolve any problems that might occur• Analyze the event’s success and handling post-event reports• Other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement: • Degree in public relations, communication, marketing, hospitality management or related fields is preferred.• Proven experience as event manager• Knowledge of KPIs and marketing techniques for event management• Outstanding communication and negotiation ability• Project management experience• A team player with leadership skills• Highly Organized and be able to multi-task• Good time management• Proficiency in various event software• Expert interpersonal skills• Risk management experience

Job Description: • Create Creative Content for Digital & Work collaboratively with KOL & Artist• Working closely with supplier for all print marketing for all station• Good at PR writing & Content Development• Work closely with related team, BA, Production, Agency and other partner to make sure marketing activation go smoothly• Worked closely with Graphic Artist and Designers to ensure the quality and creativity of the artworks are in line with brand guideline• Measure success with marketing analytics and KPIs• Other task assigned by Head of Marketing
Job Requirement: • Ability to meet deadlines and collaborate with team members• Previous work experience in marketing field• Passionate in and/or experience in sustainable solutions and/or EV charging
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Job Description:
- Manage and review day to day operation in accounting department.
- Ensure accounting function is executed in accordance with the accounting policy.
- Coach and supervises subordinate regarding technical accounting record and controls in accordance with the accounting policy.
- Ensure the completeness, accuracy and timely manner of accounting period end closing procedures.
- Ensure that the established internal control is implemented
- Produce financial report and other related performance reports for Line manager and top Management.
- Attend team weekly meeting by using PowerPoint presentation.
- Other tasks assigned by Management
- A genuine interest in the welfare of all company team member is the first and most critical requirement for this role.
- They maintain the trust of the team member, and are regarded as fair, reasonable, approachable, and honest.  
- They are passionate about improving staff welfare and guest satisfaction.  They are focused on achieving results and continual improvement.
- They always try to anticipate and exceed the needs of customers and team member.
- They use their own initiative and good judgement to solve problems in a calm and efficient way
- They enjoy working with others to achieve common goals.  They volunteer as required to ensure the success of the team.
- They act with personal professionalism and integrity at all times
- They always conduct business honestly and fairly.  They keep sensitive information confidential.
- They can prioritise their workload effectively and be organised and structured at work
- They manage their time and pay attention to detail.  They know their jobs, and are able to work without close supervision.
- They display a positive attitude, even under pressure.  They personally check their work to ensure its accuracy.
Job Requirement:
- Essential solid accountancy training and experience-professional accounting qualification.
- University degree in accounting, finance or business administration
- Degree from ACCA is preferable
- Essential 4 years ‘previous experience in similar relevant position jobs
- Excellent in computer literate especially (ERP system, Excel, Words, Internet, E-mail, and y applicable system etc)
- Highly personable, with the ability to quickly build relationships
- Be able to work under pressure. 
- Communication skills in speaking/Writing English. 
- Knowledge of computer literacy (Microsoft office word, Power point, Excel) 
- Good interpersonal and Communication skills. 
- Strong skill in organization
- Very patience, Flexible, Honest and Friendly 
- Very patience, Flexible, Honest and Friendly Working from Monday to Saturday, 8am to 5pm.

Borey Chhveang Elite is the first residential project that focuses on quality and affordability in the area of Chhveang village. We understand that people in the median income family wants one thing in common, which is quality and yet needs to ensure they can afford to purchase. 
At Borey Chhveang Elite, we devote about 10% of our total master plan land areas to create green and communal spaces, which includes parks/garden, sport club/sport field, playground, swimming pool and BBQ/special occasion area.

Job Description:
- Conduct training needs assessment within LOLC through training need and job analysis, appraisal schemes and consultation with staff’s immediate supervisor.
- Assist to develop annual training plan and training budget and ensure that all training activities are in place with budgeting effectively and efficiency.
- Formulate of training design and materials development by determining participants and sets behavioral training objective, working cross departments for training courses contents, determine the most appropriate methodologies to be used.
- Develop and coordinate all training activities process within LOLC by contacting resource persons, preparing proposal and schedule for approval and acting as a class monitor to make sure that training course is managed effectively and efficiency.
- Assist to manage e-Learning Academy to make sure learning materials are up to date and respond to learning purpose, staff can learn properly, and reporting.
- Assist to produce training reports and monthly employee training record to make sure that all training activities and staff train are regular recorded and filled.
- Conduct training follow up and reporting to make sure staff get trained are regular follow up on their competencies.
- Assist to regularly monitor quality of training and take appropriate action to strengthen training quality.
- Build networking with resource person internally and external training companies.
- Assist to conduct annual employee satisfaction survey.
- Other tasks assigned by Training and Development Unit Manager and Head of HR.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Education or Business Administration.
- Minimum of 2-year experiences as a trainer in a development-oriented institution.
- Good communication and report writing skills (able to speak and write English).
- Computer literate (Microsoft word, Excel and Power point) and knowledge of SPSS is an advantage.
- Strong leadership and motivational skills.
- Strong planning and organizing skills.
- Excellent team-player.

Job Description:
1.     Operation Management 
Ensure that Operation are running smooth:
1.1  Service: Manage and Make sure that all Machinery are ready to operate for Casting Concrete.
1.1.1      Mixer Truck
1.1.2      Pump Truck
1.1.3      Pump Machine
1.1.4      Wheel Loader
1.2  Productions: Make sure that Mix machine and peoples are ready to produce concrete on time.
1.2.1      Concrete Mixer
1.2.2      Assistant Concrete Mixer
1.2.3      Mix Machine
1.3  Quality Controller: Make sure that the quality of concrete is under control.
1.3.1      Before depart from factory
1.3.2      During casting at site
1.3.3      After casting at site
1.4  Laboratory: Make sure that the testing results of concrete are prepare and issue the report after casting at site.
1.4.1      Testing period: 7days, 14days, 28days …
1.4.2      Testing report from compressive machine
1.4.3      Report from excel by acknowledge from Management.
1.5  Workshop: Repair and Maintenance
1.5.1      Repair: Make sure the machinery is repairing on time, especially once the problem occurs at site
1.5.2      Maintenance: All machinery must have a regular schedule for checkup for maintenance.
1.6  Warehouse: Stock/Inventory
1.6.1      General Materials: Make sure stock movement is OK
1.6.2      Raw Materials: Make sure stock movement is OK and the quantity are maintaining for safety stock

2.     Report Review   
2.1  Review on Daily Production report from mix machine with actual casting
2.2  Review on Daily sale report
2.3  Review on Stock/Inventory report: Raw materials & General Materials
2.4  Review on QC & Labor report
2.5  Review on OT report
2.6  Review on Repair and Maintenance report  

3.     Preparation and Submission
3.1  Prepare and Testing Trail mix with review on mix design

4.     Others
4.1  Document’s control
4.2  Provide training to subordinate related to operation process/work flow
4.3  Schedule to Clean the factory area
4.4  Other’s task is assigned by management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Business Management or any related field 
- Over 2 years of work experience in Operation.
- 2-4 years of work experience in Supervisor level
- Fluent in English Language
- MS Office & Email
- Operation System
- Strong skills in Operation Management,
- Strong knowledge in Process Improvement & Cost Saving
- Strong knowledge in project management, planning skills
- Excellence in communication, problem solving and interpersonal skills
- Effective team and relationship building
- Strong knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
- Good at strategic and critical thinking skills

job title: ជំនួយការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងភោជនីដ្ឋាន Assistant Supervisor
position: ជំនួយការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងភោជនីដ្ឋាន Assistant Supervisor
Job Description: Reports To: Restaurant Manager/Restaurant Sup/Owner
Job Requirement:
- ភេទប្រុស/ស្រី
- មានបទពិសោធផ្នែកអារហារដ្ឋាន ឬហាងអារហារ ចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើង
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់អក្សខ្មែរបាន
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ និងភាសាអង់គ្លេសអាចប្រើការបាន
- ទំនាក់ទងល្អជាមួយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ និងបុគ្គលិកក្រុមការងារ
- ស្មោះត្រង់ ឧស្សាហ៍ ព្យាយាម ចេះបទបែនតាមការងារ និងពេលវេលា និងចេះអភិឌ្ឍន៍ចំណេះដឹង និងការងារ
- ត្រូវការអ្នកស្រលាញ់ការងារផ្នែកអារហារ និងភេជ្ជៈ

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍
- មានថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាក៤ថ្ងៃ/ខែ
- មានអារហារ២ពេល
- មានប័ណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តបុគ្គលិកដែលបំពេញការងារបានល្អ
- ប្រាក់បំណាច់ឆ្នាំ
- វាយតម្លៃឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញ
- ប្រាក់ខែ៖  Negotiation

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យការងារ
ប្រសិនបើចាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបមកផ្ទាល់ ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែល ឬលេខទូរស័ព្ទឬតាមតេលេក្រាម ៖

Job Description:
** Main Purpose of Job: 
Responsible to ensure smooth operations exists in assigned area, including: staffing, inventory, quality assurance and customer service.

Duties 
• Ensure the high-quality standard of service providing to customer in restaurant 
• Identify, research and resolve client issues 
• Ensure that restaurant operate efficiently and profitably 
• Responsible and maintaining high standards of food and service. 
• Manage and train staff to make sure that all staff performs their tasks well 
• Organize local marketing and other promotion
• Other task assigned by manager or Owner
Job Requirement:
• Experience in the Restaurant is Preferred
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills 
• Ability to train and develop team members and the ability to motivate staff 
• Honest, dedicated and motivated. 
• Strong leadership, team work and interpersonal skills 
• Be flexible with schedule and able to work under the pressure. 

** Benefits 
• There are 4 days off per month 
• Meal 2 times per shift
• Health Insurance 
• Cash Award for good performance 
• Salary raise annually with Bonus
• Salary: Negotiation

** How to Apply 
Interested candidates, please submit CVs and covering letter with stating your expected salary throw email or office address below. Only shortlist candidates will be notified and contacted by phone for interview. The documents received will not be returned.

Job Description: """(Sales Inventory Control) Plan Proper Stock Policy =Controlling Order, Clearance Slow Stock : WH , SC , Cashier , Admin staff is under admin chief s control, so keep 5S around each area is necessary. and to keep this , stock policy will be important for this.Purchase Order : (qty is determined by sales team. and approved by store manager)Inventory Return : (this impact on stock data on pos , so deeply cooperate sale team)Inspection at Receiving : this impact on stock data on pos directly .admin chief need to instruct and manage WH staff (and supporter) clearly. Product Quality Maintenance : mainly sales team has responsibility, but admin team also need to inspect them , because this could impact on customer's trust.Product Replacement (Kaihai) : under sales team ' s responsibility , but if return is related admin team also need to see.Move Goods to Store : sales team do , but impacts on stock data on pos, so admin need to see registered process is well done or not.Planning Stocktaking and Improve the Result : this is one of the most big event from the view point of stock control. store manager , both chief have to have responsibilityPreparing and Running Stocktaking : same(Sales Floor)Mainly sales team s responsibility , but admin team need support also (especially around the area of cashier , sc , wh) ----------------------------------Plan 52W Store Sales Promotion; Category, Traffic ,AdRunning and Set Up Store Sales Plan ; Order , Entrance SetupMaintenance Improving Display Effect ; End Gondola…Sales floor Maintenance; Restock, POP, Cleanliness ...Promotional In-Store Advertisement----------------------------------(Customer Service)Service Counter Operation; Inquiry, Return, Invoice, Delivery etc.…Handling ComplaintsCustomer Support at Floors>> These topics is critically important for the customer satisfaction.      Amin Chief have to take care of them seriously.(Store Admin Work)Cash RegisteringPetty Cash Control; Error Check, Keep proceeds…Security / Disaster PreparationMaintenance Store Facility / FixturesInventory Inbound RecordKeep Voucher and DocumentRecruitment Store StaffStaff EducationDealing with Visitor and Telephone Support>> These topics is critically important for the customer satisfaction.      Admin Chief have to take care of them seriously.""

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
