Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    ACCOUNTANT MANAGERREPORTS TO:   CFOLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Control Invoicing & Taxation declaration.2.  Manage and oversee the daily operations of accounting including, account     payable and account receivable, daily, weekly and monthly cash flow, weekly     cash count, month and year-end process, cash receipts, general ledger     verification, monthly payroll, budgeting, cash flow and forecasting, review     on payment voucher, revenue and expenditure variance analysis, capital     assets reconciliations and bank reconciliations.3.  Establish and maintain fiscal files and records to track document     transactions.4.  Ensure accuracy and timely monthly, quarterly and yearly end close.5.  Monitor and analyze accounting data and obtain and maintain a thorough     understanding of the financial reporting and general ledger structure.6.  Establish and enforce proper accounting methods, policies and principles.7.  Improve accounting systems, procedures and initiate corrective actions.8.  Assign projects and direct staff to ensure compliance and accuracy9.  Meet financial accounting objectives.10  Accomplish accounting and organization mission by completing related results     as needed.11. Train, coach and discipline staff to ensure high productivity and morale.12. Perform other tasks as per assigned by the Head of Finance and Accounting.
Job Requirement: -  Bachelor's or master's degree in Accounting, Finance, CPA/ACCA students or    relevant degree.-  At least 5-6 years’ experience in the accounting field with 2 in management    roles (real estate, Hotel, Apartment is preferable).-  Experienced using QuickBooks, Excel and other programs.-  Good command Knowledge of Cambodia's taxation laws and accounting software    (SAP Accounting System is preferred)-  Knowledge of accounting regulations and procedures.-  Strong leadership, high motivation, and problem-solving skills.-  Active, Friendly, Honest and Reliable.-  Honesty, Positive, Energetic, and hard-working-  Demonstrated ability to work with and across different teams.-  Strong command of English, both speaking and writing.-  Good morale and integrity.-  Organize tasks, set priorities, meet deadlines, and manage multiple tasks.-  Demonstrate good judgment and good problem-solving skills.-  Respond appropriately to evaluation and changes in the work setting.
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

job title: អ្នកឯកទេសព្រឹត្តិការណ៍  (Event Spcecilis)
position: អ្នកឯកទេសព្រឹត្តិការណ៍  (Event Spcecilis)
Job Description:
- ការទទួលសំណើពីថ្នាក់លើ និងរៀបចំផែនការព្រឹត្តិការណ៍។
- វាយតម្លៃ និងវិភាគទំហំនៃព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ ដើម្បីឈានទៅដល់ដំណើរការរៀបចំព្រឹត្តិការណ៍។
- ធ្វើផែនការលម្អិត ប៉ាន់ស្មានអ្នករៀបចំ ប៉ាន់ប្រមាណតម្លៃនៃការរៀបចំព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ និងសុំការអនុម័តថវិកា។
- រៀបចំផែនការ ទាក់ទងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ អង្គភាពដៃគូ រៀបចំ និងតុបតែងកន្លែងព្រឹត្តិការណ៍។ រៀបចំកន្លែងអង្គុយសម្រាប់ប្រតិភូ និងភ្ញៀវ; រៀបចំឧបករណ៍បំភ្លឺ និងសំឡេងសម្រាប់ព្រឹត្តិការណ៍។
- ទទួលតួនាទីជាពិធីករ និងអានព័ត៌មានពេលព្រឹក។
- ដឹកនាំ ជំនួយក្នុងការបម្រើភេសជ្ជៈ អាហារ និងអំណោយដល់អតិថិជនក្នុងព្រឹត្តិការណ៍។
- ពិនិត្យ តាមដាន និងតាមដានសកម្មភាពពីព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ចាប់ផ្តើមរហូតដល់ចប់។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលការងារសម្រាប់ថ្នាក់លើ។
Job Requirement:
- បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកទីផ្សារ ឬខ្ពស់ជាងនេះ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម សារព័ត៌មាន និងទំនាក់ទំនង រចនា ឬផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
- ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ មានទំនុកចិត្ត ចេះជួយសង្គម មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការងារ មានកម្លាំងចិត្តខ្ពស់ អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ។
- បទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការរៀបចំព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ MC ការចូលរួមក្នុងសកម្មភាព។
- មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ធ្វើបទបង្ហាញ និងចរចារ មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូល គិត ធ្វើការដោយឯករាជ្យ និងល្អជាក្រុម មានស្មារតីរៀនសូត្រខ្ពស់។
- ដឹងពីរបៀបថែរក្សាអតិថិជន បង្កើត និងរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជន។
- សមត្ថភាពនិយាយ និងសរសេរ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងវៀតណាម គឺជាការបូកបន្ថែម

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖
- ប្រាក់ខែគោល 
- ធ្វើការពីច័ន្ទដល់សុក្រ ម៉ោង8-12 និង1-5ល្ងាច 
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភអាហារ
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ
- ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ អាស្រ័យលើការងាររបស់អ្នក។
- ធានារ៉ាប់រង
- ផ្សេងទៀត………
Company Profile: ក្នុងនាមជាក្រុមហ៊ុនពហុជាតិសាសន៍របស់កាណាដា ការិយាល័យកណ្តាលនៅប្រទេសវៀតណាម បានអភិវឌ្ឍទៅកាន់ប្រទេសមួយចំនួនដូចជា ប្រទេសថៃ ឥណ្ឌូនេស៊ី ម៉ាឡេស៊ី ... និងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា ក្នុងវិស័យអាជីវកម្ម សេវាកម្រៃជើងសាលើការ ការជួញដូររូបិយប័ណ្ណ ការជួញដូរភាគហ៊ុន ការជួញដូរ COIN  ដែរកំពង់មានការរីកចំរើនខ្លាំងក្នុងវិស័យអាជីវកម្មមួយនេះ។

job title: អ្នកឯកទេសមាតិកា( Marketing Content )
position: អ្នកឯកទេសមាតិកា( Marketing Content )
Job Description:
- បង្កើត និងគ្រប់គ្រងមាតិកា (រួមទាំងការសរសេរមាតិកា ការបង្ហាញខ្លឹមសារ គំនិតអំពីរូបភាព) នៅលើ Fan page គេហទំព័រ គ្រប់គ្រងបណ្តាញទំនាក់ទំនងសង្គមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- សម្របសម្រួលនិងសហការណ៏ជាមួយក្រុមទីផ្សារ ដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការខ្លឹមសារលម្អិតសម្រាប់ Fan page របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះការផលិតខ្លឹមសារប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ (ឌីជីថល/ក្រៅបណ្តាញ,...) ដូចជាអត្ថបទ គំនិត វីដេអូ/រូបភាព។ល។
- សរសេរអត្ថបទ PR តាមខ្លឹមសារដែលបានស្នើសុំដោយថ្នាក់លើ
- ចូលរួមក្រុមដើម្បីបង្កើត និងគ្រប់គ្រងយុទ្ធនាការទីផ្សារ រួមចំណែកគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតមាតិកាសម្រាប់យុទ្ធនាការទីផ្សារឌីជីថល។
- ការកែសម្រួលមាតិកាប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅលើបណ្តាញទំនាក់ទំនងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន (មាតិកាព័ត៌មាននៅលើគេហទំព័រ ខ្លឹមសារនៅលើបណ្តាញសង្គម អ៊ីមែល មាតិកា PR ខាងក្រៅ មាតិកាគ្រាប់ពូជ ... ) ។

Job Description:
"• Draft legal research for legal consultation and/or legal advice.
• Draft legal documents which include but are not limited to legal memorandum, contracts, and other relevant paperwork,  
• Assist in processing legal documents to the court, ministry of interior, and other authorities when necessary.
• Prepare and/or review commercial contracts including but are not limited to, Sale and Purchase Agreements, contractor’s agreements, bidding documents, service provision contracts, etc.
• Assist in reviewing the existing legal cases.
• Assist in writing/issuing official litigation letters to ensure updated information/litigation letters are reached out to customers/clients when necessary.
• Work with the cross-department to proceed with the legal advice, ensure effective implementation of the legal actions, give feedback to the attorney and management, and follow up on the case.
• Jointly or directly communicate with customers/clients, officers, and other relevant stakeholders (if authorized).
• Assist in researching marketing content, marketing and promotional video scripts, and business information that shall be posted on social media or business if necessary.
• Translate legal documents, contracts, and memorandums from Khmer to English and vice versa.
• Assist the legal manager to monitor all related training and development plans to relevant departments to ensure legal litigation is up to date when necessary.
• Perform other tasks as per assigned by the legal manager or cross-department when necessary."
Job Requirement:
"• Graduated with at least Bachelor’s Degree in Law or equivalent in a related field.
• Proven at least 2-3 years of previous work experience in the legal field or relevant field.
• Good command of spoken and written English language.
• Ability to work independently with limited supervision.
• Ability to effectively communicate with peers, managers, and clients.
• Strong organizational and interpersonal skills.
• Excellent communication, organizational and communication skills.
• Ability to work under pressure and with personnel from all levels.
• Ability to multi-task and prioritize multiple work demands.
•	Empathetic individuals with great interpersonal skills."

Job Description: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.lnstitut Pasteur du Cambodge is recruiting a full-time technical manager in chemistry to work in the Laboratory of Environment and Food Safety (LEFS).* Main responsibilities:- Train new staff on food and water chemistry analysis- Evaluate and monitoring staff competency on food and water chemistry analysis- Ensure staff following SOP- Ensure staff respect security and hygiene procedures- Validate technical sheet- Write and Review SOP- Develop new methods on food and water chemistry analysis- Ensure analysis timeline- Involve in accreditation process- Any task required by head of laboratory
Job Requirement: * Candidate Profile:- Excellent knowledge in food and water chemistry- Mastering of good laboratory practices- Mastering internet and computer skills- Excellent physical condition- Rigorous, sense of responsibilities- Dynamic character, eager to learn, sociable and enthusiastic* Recruitment conditions:- Diploma related to food science, Chemistry- Experience at least 5 years with food and water chemistry- Experience with AAS, ICP-IOS, HPLC and GC-MS/MS- Experience with ISO17025 is plus- Language required: good English or French- Available to start on January 2nd, 2023The complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.Deadline: December 22nd, 2022.
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

Company Profile:
Start your career at Arup, listed in Engineering News Record as one of the top “Best Green Design Firms”, “Top Global Design Firms”, and featured on Fortune Magazine's "Change The World" list of companies that are making the world a better place.

Arup is an independent engineering and consulting firm of 14,000 people in 42 countries around the world. Founded in 1946, we are the creative force at the heart of many of the world’s most prominent projects in the built environment, including the Sydney Opera House, the London Eye, and the Beijing National Stadium (aka the Bird's Nest).

During your career at Arup, you’ll have the chance to engage in a fulfilling career and work with some of the most highly respected engineers and specialists in the world. You’ll also get the opportunity to work on exciting and significant projects, delivering quality work that has a positive and lasting influence on the community and the environment.

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for a full-time nurse to deliver a high standard and quality of professional nursing care to all patients or clients at Raffles Medical Clinic in Phnom Penh. The incumbent is also expected to work collaboratively with the team and other colleagues to address the needs of patients and other stakeholders, according to specified policies and practices compliant with Raffles Medical and national
requirements.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide the highest possible level of nursing care to all patients consistent with international standards
- Take and monitor vital signs of patients and check for any irregularities in their conditions
- Prioritize health problems and intervene appropriately to assist the patient in complex, urgent or emergency situations, including initiation of effective emergency care
- Maintain and process patients’ records and report patients’ conditions to doctors/physicians
- Help patients to get ready for tests and other examinations
- Implement patient care program
- Clean wounds and cuts
- Advise, support and, where appropriate, administer vaccinations for patients
- Attend various meetings, workshops, and training as required to maintain updated on skills and knowledge of best nursing practices
- Implement in compliance with nursing policies and procedures
- Utilize and demonstrate sensitive communication styles, to ensure patients are fully informed and consent to treatment
- Communicate effectively with patients and caregivers, recognizing the need for alternative methods of communication to overcome different levels of understanding, cultural background and preferred ways.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Strong understanding of nursing process.
- Strong understanding of emergency protocols and nursing actions during an emergency
- Attention to details and problem-solving approach.
- Computer literacy.
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate a professional manner at all times
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate knowledge in all aspects of nursing and technical ability to operate all medical equipment.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.
- Will demonstrate punctuality and good attendance.

Required Competencies
- Physically, emotionally, and mentally fit
- Customer care
- Teamwork
- Problem solving
- Interpersonal and communication skills
- Sympathy

Required Work Experience
- At least one year’s experience working as a nurse preferable in a high dependency or emergency area.

Required Qualifications
- Nursing Diploma or Bachelor Degree or country equivalent.

Required Languages
- Proficient in English
- Khmer
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 216 911 / 012 497 761 saly_man@rafflesmedical.com No 161, Street 51 Beoung Raing, Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 023 216 911 / 012 497 761

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for a full-time Customer Service Representative and several part-
time/locum Customer Service Representatives to effectively maintain the highest level of client service
standards through support of the clinic staff and by providing efficient and consistent delivery of non-medical
support services to clients.

Key Responsibilities
- Greets the patient in a warm and friendly manner–speaking English.
- Assist the patient in completing information forms, Insurance forms, making appointments. Also, answer any questions the patient might have.
- Admits new patients to the system (manually and on computer)
- Maintains the reception areas in relation to tidiness, stationary & supplies.
- Maintains the paper or electronic file that constitutes the Medical Records and obtains that record from the files for the patient and/or doctor.
- Logs appointments & notifies doctor, staff & patient of the time & date.
- Logs all files that are taken out of the clinic
- Reviews the treatment form and processes an invoice for patient. Reminds the doctor if all the treatment forms have not been complete
- Makes credit card transactions and receives authorization for credit card payment.
- Answers all questions the patient may have concerning the invoice payment
- Assists accounting in reconciliation of daily cash with the accounting department.
- Keeping up-to-date lists of credit agreements, Raffles Medical membership and procedures.
- Administrates cashless medical service (CMS) & direct billing claims to insurance companies
- Working with the accounting department concerning lost receipts, receipts for insurance purposes, refunds, daily deposits of cash, credit card receipts, checks, and credit problems & accounts receivables.
- Process closing day and back up report through the computer system in the morning and evening time.
- Maintains confidentiality of all clients and Raffles Medical business.
- Is familiar with the SOPP’s for the Immigration Visa Health Check Clinic & follows the Raffles Medical & embassy SOPP’s implicitly.
- Notifies supervisor or Senior Management staff when an issue, incident or accident arises with a client or staff.
- Ensures that any accounts receivable are followed up daily and activity recorded.
- Assist in the administration of all insurance Claims (Life/Accident/Prepaid programs)– Insurance Claims.
- Be available to work any shift according to Roster requirements.
- Is familiar with the infection control SOPP’s & hazardous exposure SOPP.
- Complete other tasks / projects assigned by the Manager.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Knowledge and skill of customer services
- Interpersonal, presentation and communication skills
- Good organizational skills
- Computer literacy (MS Office, internet, email, etc)
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.

Required Competencies
- Supervisory and leadership skills
- Excellent organizational skills
- Conflict and complaint handling skills
- Change management skills

Required Work Experience
- At least 1 years of experience in customer service, however fresh graduates with no relevant experience is invited to apply.

Required Qualifications
-  University degree or 4th-year university student in English, management or related field

Required Languages
- English and Khmer

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Working closely with Hospital Marketing (HM), Raffles Hospital Singapore, the Manager of Representative Office, Cambodia, shall be responsible for leading, developing and managing the marketing of the Hospital to Cambodia. He/she shall develop the marketing strategies and plans to grow the business of the Hospital.
He/she shall be responsible for identifying and establishing networks and channels that will help grow the market share of the Hospital. The Manager shall supervise and manage the patient support services, including language assistance, to
assure local patients and corporate clients of excellent service experience in Raffles Hospital Singapore.

Key Responsibilities
(A) SPECIFIC (80%)
1. Lead and manage all the operations of Representative Office, Cambodia including marketing & sales support, administration, finance, customer services and legal issues.
2. Direct, develop and implement marketing strategies, plans and programmed in cooperation with HM to promote the business and utilization of services offered by the Hospital.
3. Conduct research on markets, competitors, and competitive trends to identify business opportunities to grow the business.
4. Working closely with HM to identify, develop, and manage associates to promote patient referrals to the Hospital.
5. Lead and develop the team in building and maintaining effective relationship with the associates and corporate clients, and developing their capacity to grow patient referrals to the Hospital.
6. In cooperation with HM to establish, develop and implement service support services (such as marketing, administrative fees, and information) for associates and patient liaison offices that will help them promote and grow the patient referrals to the Hospital.
7. Direct and develop an effective corporate communications and advertising programme in support of the marketing to local markets in Cambodia.
8. In cooperation with HM to establish, implement and review policies, procedures and protocols to ensure smooth and effective execution and performance of all marketing and advertising programmes.
9. Establish and develop joint marketing programmes and co-funding with local partners (if any).
10. Oversee the analysis and track the outcome of all marketing and advertising programmes.
11. Establish and implement a transparent system of reporting which includes regular reports and ad hoc reports as needed.
12. Establish and maintain an effective system for receipt and response to customer feedback.
13. Recruit, retain, and develop talent, skills and key competencies within the unit to provide and support the Hospital’s local marketing programmes and initiatives.
14. Plan and manage budgets and resources to achieve efficiency and department goals.

(B) GENERAL (20%)
1. Foster a climate of teamwork and co-operation, passion for service excellence, and openness for sharing of ideas and training.
2. Be a service ambassador and a role model for empathetic listening and going the extra mile to be of service to patients.
3. Perform any other duties as assigned by the Head of HM/ Senior Manager.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Excellent communication skills
- Ability to maintain relationships with internal and client contacts
- Energetic and enthusiastic
- A team player both within the department and with the other divisions within the organisation.
- Attention to detail

Required Competencies
- Integrity and trust
- Hard working with a positive attitude
- Peer relationships
- Able to work under tight deadlines

Required Work Experience
- preferably with relevant experience of at least 5 years

Required Qualifications
- Degree in any discipline

Required Languages
- Good knowledge of English and Khmer

Travel / Rotation Requirements
- Requires occasional traveling.

Job Description: - Prepare the project plans, schedules and specifications and comment on the building design, scheduling, possible cost saving measures and potential construction problems.- Assist estimator in preparation of project budget plans.- Preparing tender and contract documents, including BOQ (bills of quantities) for bidding.- To supervise and assign all staffs into proper roles by ensuring that all productivities carried out are strictly in accordance to assignment from company management committee and Mr. Chairman.- To implement for specific project procedures.- To bring about optimum utilization of resources- labor, materials and equipment, and ensuring their procurement at most cost-effective terms.- To perform a key role in project planning, budgeting, and identification of resources needed.- To assist company on business expansion plan with budget projection and target to complete construction for operation schedule.- To present reports containing details regarding the project's progress to chairman and committees.- To monitor the progress of the construction activities on a regular basis and hold regular status meetings from team.- To follow up with team to ensure that work is being carried out as per design/specification/or planning.- To define for other solution of special construction issues and site conditions.- To manage work flow for internal team to meet company requirement.- To ensure work quality of construction properly done and in accordance with timeline of the project.- To manage stock control system.- Worldwide knowledge on construction and design.- Worldwide knowledge on construction and design management.- Good knowledge on business to develop company more glory and sustainable.- To have acknowledgement on Health Safety and Environment system for building.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s or Master’s degree of construction field.- Minimum six years for experience in construction management and four years for experience in office management.- Bachelor’s or master’s degree of civil engineering or architecture.- Good command of reading, writing and speaking English.- Proficiency in computer skills program MS office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Microsoft project), and other programs related to skills involved.- Ability to coordinate and direct construction activities at work site.- Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.- Passionate about building environment and care about people and environment.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
•	Performs diversified accounting and tax assignments under the direction of a Senior or Manager Prepares personal, corporate, partnership, and TCO returns of increasing complexity.
•	Responds to tax notices of any sort and prepares initial drafts of letters required.
•	Prepares tax accruals as may be required. 
•	Participates in tax planning and projections.
•	Support junior tax professionals with day-to-day guidance.
•	Assist with data collection from internal departments and divisions to satisfy compliance needs.
•	Assist with research and completion of tax notices and tax audits.
•	Propose and develop procedures to improve processes related to tax filings.
•	Research tax issues and prepare and/or review memos to document conclusions. Interact and develop relationships with business unit staff to facilitate tax compliance and reporting and analyze tax impact of business decisions.
•	Scan and file any information used to prepare tax filings.
•	Work with internal departments to collect data necessary to prepare government tax 
•	Gather documentation and prepare tax calculations in support from senior or manager
•	Assist in calculation and review of state income tax credit adjustments.
•	Assist in tax provision preparations.
•	Responsible for analyzing and supporting income tax filing positions.
•	Analyze tax law changes and implications to company business.
•	Make recommendations for data gathering and analysis in support of current tax law.
•	Perform other activities, duties, and responsibilities as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or related field and 5 years in corporate tax
•	Construction industry experience preferred
•	Supervisory/management of small team preferred
•	Excellent knowledge of tax and accounting principles to ensure timely and accurate reporting
•	Remain current in applicable tax laws to offer and implement suggestions to improve overall operations
•	Apply critical thinking to manage through complex decisions and judgments
•	Ability to manage activities, requests, and short-cycle deadlines simultaneously
•	Able to observe performance and effectively provide performance feedback
•	Knowledge of financial system applications, advanced knowledge of MS Excel and MS Word
•	Self-motivated, adaptable and flexible to operate with minimal direction and little or no supervision while working in complex and changing environment
•	Lead by example and set standards for performance and behavior; act with integrity and professionalism, strong dedication to teamwork
•	Professional written and verbal communication skills
•	High degree of organizational skills with exceptional attention to detail.

Job Description:
- Meet and exceed individual sales targets set by the company.
- 20 – 30 quality cold call and at least 1-3 targeted customers meeting per day.
- Build up good brand image of the company and product in the market.
- Handling customer’s objections.
- Prepare sales daily and sales weekly report and report to Team Leader.
- Make sure all the sales flow of corporate team that has been set by the company are going smooth.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
